Toͤw buhß ißraut tawu Atʒ / kad ta toͤw karrina / taß gir / nhe dohd tawai Atʒ Waļļas ẜchurrp und turrp ſkattiteeß / tahdohs Kacktohß / unnd tahdas Leetas / ka tu warraͤtu apghraͤkoteeß . Luhds allaſch Deewu / unnd ẜacki : Kungs / noghrees mannas Atʒis nohſt / ka tahß nhe ſkattahß pehtʒ willtighas Mahʒibas . Nhe ſkattais pehtʒ Meitahm / ka tu nhe eekarrẜieẜi prett tahm / noghrees tawu Waighu no ſkaiſtahm Ꞩeewahm / unnd nhe luhko pehtʒ Ghiemi ʒitto Ꞩeewo / aiſto ſkaiſtas Ꞩeewas gir daſchu apmahnejuẜchi / unnd nhe jauka Eekaroẜchana attlaͤtʒ no tahß / ka kahds Vgguns / ẜacka Syrachs . Bett Deewam ſchaͤhl / daſchereis mehs irr nhe ſinnadami ghraͤkojam / und irr taß Taißnis ſeptinjas Reiſas Deenà kriet / ẜacka taß Konings Salomon / tad laideeta mums jo drieſahk jo labbahk attſtaht no Ghraͤkeem / aiſto tad mehß tohß ẜwaͤhtus Enghelus ar muhſẜo Deewabijaẜchanu eepreeʒenahẜim / ka Chriſtus mahʒa ẜatʒidams : Liexmiba buhß preekſchan Deewa Engheleem par weenu Ghrehʒeneeku / katters no Ghraͤkeem attſtahjahß . Klauſẜaita labpraht [S. 2.294{274}] Deewa Wahrdu / und darreeta tickuẜche / ko Deews jums uslitʒis gir / tad tee ẜwaͤhti Engheli labpraht allaſch py jums buhß / luhdſeeta Deewam : O manns Debbeſẜo Taͤhws / taws ẜwaͤhtʒ Enghels laid py mann palleek / ka taß ļauns Eenaidneex nhe kahdu Spaͤhku py mann warr dabbuit / und man pee⸗walldiet : Pawehl tawam Enghelam ka taß nahk / Tawus Ļaudis paſẜarghaht / Dohd mums tohß krahßnus Ꞩarrghus / Ka mehs tha Waͤlla dehļ duſẜeht warram . Tad ghullam mehs tawà Wahrdà / Kad nu tee Engheli py mums gir / Tu ẜwaͤhta Triaidiba / Mehs teitʒam toͤw muhſchighe / Amen / Amen / Amen ! 

Teil 2.22

Evangelium am siebenʒehenden Sontag nach Trinitatis / Luc. 14. 

To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / ka muhſẜo Kungs Jeſus Chriſtus eekẜchan weena Warriſeeŗa Wirßneeka Nammu us Ꞩwaͤhtudeenu aͤhßdams / weenu Vhdensẜehrʒighu Ʒillwaͤku waͤſẜaͤlu darrijis gir / laſẜam mehs unnd ſkann tee Wahrdi juſẜà Wallodà tha : [S. 2.295{275}] 

VNd taß notickahß / ka JEſus nahʒe weena Wirſẜeeneeka Nammà / Ꞩwaͤhtà deenà to Mais ehſt . Vnd tee ghluneja us winju . Vnd raugi / turr by weens Ʒillwaͤhx preekſchan winju / taß by Vdenaẜehrdſiegs . Vnnd JEſus adbilldeja / unnd runnaja us teems Raxta Maʒetajeems unnd Wariſeereems / und ẜatʒija : Arrieg peedaͤrr Ꞩwaͤhtà deenà dſedenaht ? Bett tee ʒeete kluſẜe . Vnd wings jehme / und dſeedenaja to / unnd pallaide to . Vnnd adbilldeja / und ẜatʒija us teems : Kaß gir juhſẜo ſtarrpà / kam ẜaws Wehrſẜis jeb Eſelis Ackà eekriet / unnd taß to tudeļ nhe ißwaͤllk Ꞩwaͤhtà deenà . Vnnd tee nhe warreja winjam nhe neeka us to atkal adbildeht . [S. 2.296{276}] Bett wings ẜatʒija weenu Liedſibu teem Weeſẜeem / nomannidams / ka tee wehlejahß auxtaka weetà ẜehdeht / unnd ẜatʒija us teem : Kad tu no weenu aitʒenahts kļuhſti Kahſahß / tad nhe ẜehdees auxtakà Weetà / ka nhe nahx kahds Ʒeenigahx / nhe ka tu / kaß no winju aitʒenahts gir . Vnnd kad taß tad nahk / kaß toͤw unnd winju aitʒenajis gir / us toͤw ẜacka / wirrſees ẜchim / unnd toͤw buhß tad ar Kaunu ſaͤmmoja weetà ẜehdeht . Bett kad tu aitʒenahts kļuhſti / tad no⸗ey / unnd ẜehdees ſaͤmmoja weetà / kad taß nahk / kaß toͤw aitʒenajis gir / us toͤw ẜacka : Draugs / wirrſees aukſcham . Tad buhß toͤw Ghohds preekſhan teems / kattri ar toͤw py Ghalldu ẜehſch . Aiſto kaß ẜoͤw patʒ auxtenajahß / tam buhß ſaͤmmotam tapt / unnd kaß ẜoͤw patʒ ſaͤmmojahß / tam buhß auxtenaͤtam tapt . 

ꞨChiß ẜwaͤhtʒ preekſchelaſẜietʒ Ewangeliums peedaͤrr pirrmajan kahrtan eekſchan to treſſchu Baußli / kad Deews tha ẜacka : Toͤw buhß to ẜwaͤhtu Deenu ẜwehtiet . Aiſto ſcheitan dſirrdam mehß / ka JEſus Chriſtus us Ꞩwaͤhtu Deenu irr py Ghalldu ẜaͤdaͤdams / und aͤhßdams tohß Ļaudis unnd Weeſẜis mahʒa / lieds ar to Ꞩaimneeku . Ka tad nu taß Kungs JEſus to ẜwaͤhtu Deenu ẜwehti Deewa Wahrdu mahʒidams / ihten tha buhß mums arridſan to ẜwaͤhtu Deenu ẜwehtiet / To Mahʒibu und Deewa Wahrdu nhe [S. 2.297{277}] pullghodami / bett to paſſchu ẜwaͤhtu turraͤdami / labpraht dſirrdaͤdami / unnd to mahʒiet . Ohtran kahrtan peedaͤrr ẜchiß Ewangeliums eekſchan to peektu Baußli / kad Deews ẜacka : Toͤw nhe buhß nokaut . Aiſto ſcheitan dſirrdam mehs attkal / ka JEſus CHRJſtus ẜchim Nheweſẜelam irr ẜwaͤhtà deenà pallieds / mums mahʒidams / ka mums buhß muhſẜam Tuwakam pallidſeht unnd kallpoht eekſchan wiſẜahms baͤhdahms / und ick⸗kattrà laikà . Vnd ka mehß muhſẜu Lohpu / katters jeb Ackà ee⸗krittiß / jeb Duhxny ee⸗ſtidſis / nhe at⸗ſtahjam / bett mehß to peſtijam no ẜawu Mohku unnd Nahwu / ʒeek ſpaͤhdami irr ẜwaͤhtà deenà ; Jhten tha buhß mums arridſan pallidſeht muhſẜam Tuwakam Ʒillwaͤkam / unnd tam kallpoht nhe luhkodami us to ẜwaͤhtu deenu . Bett ka mums muhſẜam Tuwakam pallidſeht unnd kallpoht buhß irr ẜwaͤhtà deenà / to mahʒa mums taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Jacobs : ka mums buhß Barinus unnd Attraitnes ẜawas Bahdahß apluhkoht / und ick⸗kattram pallidſeht ar labbu Wahrdu kad wings noſkummis gir / ar Deewa Wahrdu ee⸗preeʒenaht / ja wings nhewaͤſẜaͤls gir / und ja ʒitta kahda Nhelaime noteekahß ar Vgguns⸗Ghraͤku / jeb arr Noẜliekẜchanu / jeb ʒittʒ kahds Ghraͤks / tad buhß mums peetetʒeht / unnd tam pallidſeht ; Aiſto / wiß ko juhß ghribbaht / ko ʒitteems Ļaudeems jums darriet buhß / to darraita juhß winjeems . Vnd taß nhe gir ghann / ka juhß labbe darraht juhſẜeems Draugheems / unnd pallidſeeta juhſẜeems Labbe⸗darritajeems / kattri jums attkal pallidſeht unnd labbe darriet warr ; bett jums buhß irr tam / kaß juhſẜu Prettibeneex gir / und juhſẜu Eenaidneex / labbe darriet ick⸗katrrà laikà / ka juhß eſẜeeta Baͤhrni juhſẜo Taͤhwa Debbeſẜieß . Aiſto Wings leek ẜawu Ꞩaul uslehkt par Ļauneems und par labbeems / unnd leek Leetu liet par Taißneems unnd Nhetaißneems . Ꞩchim brieſcham ghribbam mehs klauſẜiteeß / ka JESVS [S. 2.298{278}] Chriſtus weenu Vhdens⸗ẜehrdſighu us Ꞩwaͤhtu deenu weenà Warieſeeŗa Nammà waͤſẜaͤlu darrijis gir . O Kunngs JEſu Chriſte / ẜwehti tu muhſẜas Ꞩirrdes ar tawu Ꞩwaͤhtu Gharru / ka mehs warram mahʒiteeß to Ꞩwaͤhtu deenu ihſtane unnd parreiſe ẜwehtiet / unnd muhſẜam Tuwakam Ʒillwaͤkam allaſch pallidſeht / Amen . 

MAnni Draughi / Taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Mahʒetais Syrachs ẜacka : Mahjotaju teitʒ tee Ļaudis / unnd ẜacka / taß aͤſẜohtʒ ghodiegs Wiers / unnd tha gir labba Ꞩlawa ; bett no ẜiekſtu Ꞩunni runna wiſẜa Jellghawa nhelabbe / unnd kļuhſt arridſan teeẜcham ẜatʒietʒ . Ꞩchohß Wahrdus attminnaͤdams ẜchiß Wariſeŗo Wirſẜeneex / luhds to Kunghu CHRiſtum JEſum Weeſẜibahß / bett tomaͤhr / nhe itt no labbas Ꞩirrds . Aiſto wings wehl ʒittus Weeſẜis by luhdſis / kattri us Jeſum CHriſtum / ka Kurrtʒ us Sagki ghluneja / winji klauſẜahß ar Blehſcha⸗Auſẜeems / arrieg tee warraͤtu no tha Kungha Chriſti Wahrdeems und darrbeems ko ißklauſẜiet / ka tee pehtʒ warraͤtu tam pee⸗krahpt . Winji ghluhna us to Kunnghu JEſum / ka Willx us Ahwi / und ka Sirrneji us Muſẜchahm{Muhẜchahm} . Tahds by taß Ꞩaimneex / tahdi by Weeſẜis / wiß weenà Ꞩlackà / no kattreems taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliſts Lucas ʒittà weetà ẜacka : Tee ghluneja us to / unnd mekkleja / arrieg tee warraͤtu ko attapt no winja Muttes / ka tee to warraͤtu abẜuhdſeht . Bett JEſus Chriſtus / jebſche Wings / ka kahds Kunngs / kaß wiſẜas leetas raͤds und ſinna / irr ẜcho Blehdibu ghann raͤds / eet tomaͤhr luhkts Weeſẜibahs / us Ꞩwaͤhtu deenu / aiſto kad mehs Deewa Wahrdu aͤſẜam mahʒijuẜchi / dſirrdejuſchi / unnd Deewam kallpojuẜchi / tad Deews ghann warr ee⸗redſeht / ka mehß aͤhdam / dſeŗŗam / unnd liexmi aͤſẜam / bett Deewa bie[S. 2.299{279}] dami . Vnnd jeb mehs aͤhdam jeb dſeŗŗam / jeb ko mehs darram / to buhß mums wiß darriet Deewam par Ghodu . Taß Kungs JEſus jaͤmm par labbu to Mais / kattra winjam preekſcha ʒaͤllta tohp / unnd gir ar Meeru / nhe ghaida ʒaͤpptus Ʒahļus / ka Deewam ſchaͤhl taggad daſcha Ꞩaime nhe ſinna / ko ta ehſt ghribb / tick kahra ta gir . Mahʒais ẜcheitan no tawu Kunghu JEſum Chriſtum par labbu jembt / ko toͤw Deews dohd / unnd leek preekſcha ʒellt / unnd nhe dohdeeß us Kahrumu / und nhe nitʒini Deewa Dahwanu . Nhe eſẜi arridſan ſtarpan teems Plieteneekeems und Dſaͤrajeems / aiſto tee Dſaͤraji unnd Plieteneeki iß⸗niext / unnd nhe eſẜi Dſirrulis / unnd nhe jauʒeeß plieteht / ka tu nhe kļuhſẜi par Deedelneeku / unnd kad toͤ wairs Naudas nhe gir Mackà / us Addoẜchanu jajaͤmm gir . Strahdneex / kaß ẜoͤw labpraht pee⸗dſeŗŗahß / taß nhe tohp baggahtʒ / unnd kaß maſu nhe taupa / taß allaſch nabbaghahx kļuhſt . Kad tu arridſan Weeẜibahß ey / tad nhe dohma / nu ſcheitan gir ghann ja⸗ry / nu buhß toͤw Kannas und Bickeŗus iß⸗ſteept / ka daſſch Allus⸗Muẜcha darra / bett apdohma M.D. ko JEſus Chriſtus ẜacka : Ꞩarrghajeteeß / ka Juhſẜas Sirrdes nhe kļuhſt abghrutenatas ar Ryſchanu unnd leeku Dſerrẜchanu . Negg daſche reis kluhſt dſirrdaͤhtʒ / ka leela Nhelaime no leekas Dſerrẜchanas nahk / ar Bahrſchanu / ar Kauẜchanu / daſſch tha abdſeŗŗahß ka taß no ẜawu Prahtu nheſinna / unnd eekriet leelohß Ghraͤkohß . Daſſch peedſehris tudeļļ mirrſt . Bett kur tahdam palleek tha Dwehſẜele ? Way / way tai / way ! Aiſto taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils ẜacka / ka tee Plieteneeki / tee Dſaͤhraji / tee Dſirruli ( tee Suhpuhtes ) to Deewa Wallſtibu nhe manntohß . Ja tad nu tahds to Deewa Wallſtibu nhe manntohß / tad wings patteeſẜe tha Ļauna Waͤlla Wallſtibu dabbuis / aiſto kaß nhe gir py Deewu / taß gir patteeſẜe py Waͤllu / und [S. 2.300{280}] tur wings waimaņas muhſcho muhſcham ẜaux / uñ kaux ar to baggatu Wieru / katters lieds ẜchim laikam wehl nhe Ꞩurrbiņu / nhe Lahſẜiet Vdens dabbujis gir / ẜawu ißkalltuſchu Mehl dſiſẜenaht / und ẜatʒis / eß ʒeeſchu Mohkas ſchinnies Elles Laͤhßmohß . Jebſche taß Kungs JEſus Weeẜibahs gir / tad tomaͤhr wings pallieds ẜchim Nheweſẜeļam{Nhewaſẜeļam} : Kad Deews toͤw M.D. preeʒighu deenu dohd / nhe aismirſti tha Nabbagha Ʒillwaͤka / tad toͤw arridſan Preex notix / kattru tu ghribbi . To arridſan Chriſtus JEſus ſchim paſſcham Wariſeeŗam ẜacka / katters to luhdſis by : Kad tu Malltiet jeb Wackarà ehdeni darri / tad nhe luhds tawus Draughus / neds tawus Brahļus / neds tawus Raddus / neds tawus Kaiminus / kattri baggati gir / ka tee attkal nhe luhds / unnd toͤw attmaxahtʒ tohp . Bett kad tu Weeẜibas darri / tad luhds tohß Nabbaghus / tohß Krohpļus / tohß Tißlus / tohß Acklus / tad eſẜi tu ẜwehtietʒ . Aiſto teems nhe gir ar ko toͤw attmaxaht : bett taß taps toͤw attmaxahtʒ / eekſchan tahß Aukſcham⸗Ʒellẜchanas to Taißno . Tapehtʒ apdohma tawahß Weeẜibahs irr to Nabbaghu Ʒillwaͤku / katters preeſchan taweems Durrweems ſtahw / aiſto / Labb tam / kaß tha Nabbagha aisjaͤmmahß / to taß Kungs attpeſties nicknohß laikohß / taß Kunngs to ghellbehß / unnd dſiewu usturrehß / unnd tam labbe lix klahteeß wirſẜon Semmes / und nhe dohß to ẜawa Eenaidneeka Ee⸗ghribbeẜchanà / taß Kunngs to eepreeʒinahß us ẜawu ghruhtu ghulltu / Tu ( O Deews ) palliedſi tam no wiſẜas ẜawas Nheweſẜelibas . Chriſtus JEſus Weeẜibas buhdams runna ghodighe / und mahʒa tohß ʒittus Weeẜis unnd to Ꞩaimneeku / ka teems ẜoͤw turreteeß buhß . M.D. ey / unnd darri arridſan tha . Kad tu py Deewa Dahwanu / unnd ar ghodigheems Ļaudeems liexmis eſẜi / nhe runna aplam / wiß kaß toͤw preekſch Sohbeem nahk / nhe nee[S. 2.301{281}] wa / nhe nitʒini / nhe apẜmei tawu Tuwaku Ʒillwaͤku / nhe runna beßkaunighe / nhe dſeedi tahdus dſeeßmus / ka Deews / kad Wings ſchehliegs nhe buhtu / tawas nhemaſghatas Muttes dehļ / toͤw / unnd irr ʒittus ghodighus Ļaudis ar Vgguni no Debbeſẜu ẜadaͤdſenatu . Daſſch plukſche unnd tehrſe / patʒ nhe ſinnadams / ka Meeļa⸗Tappa / ko taß runna / und buhtu labbahk / kad taß kluſẜe ʒeeſtu . Daſſch peedſehris wiß iß⸗runna / kaß winjam py Ꞩirrds gir / unnd ko nhedſaͤruſcham ar Tangham nhe buhtu ißwilʒis . Dſirrdi / ko taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils mahʒa : Juhſẜas Runnas leeʒeeta allaſchien mielighas buht / und ar Ꞩahli ẜahlitas . Bett turr prettie / Wai tam Ʒillwaͤkam / ʒaur kattru Abghrehʒiba nahk / tam butu labbahk / ka tam weens Dſirrna⸗ackmins py winja Kacklu peekahrtʒ tapptu / und abẜlieʒenahtʒ taptu Juhry / kur wiß⸗dſiļļahk gir / ẜacka JEſus Chriſtus . Tadehļ M.D. kaß teeẜe gir / kas ghodighe / kaß taißne / kaß kaunighe / kaß mielighe kaß labbe ſkann / ja ghohds gir / ja Ꞩlahwa gir / us to domajeeta . Taß Kunngs JEſus dſedina ẜcho Nheweſẜeli us ẜwaͤhtu deenu . Wings ſinna unnd raͤds ick⸗kattram Ʒillwaͤkam Ꞩirrdy / ko taß dohma / ihten tha Wings arridſan nomanna / ka ẜchiß Blehds taß Wariſeeŗo Wirſẜeneex Winju nhe no labbas bett blehdighas Ꞩirrds luhdſis by / unnd ka winja Beedri tadehl arridſan py Ghalldu ẜehdeja / ka tee us to Kunghu JEſum ghluneja . Tapehtʒ jauta wings : Ꞩirrahg pareiſe Ꞩwaͤhtà⸗deenà dſeedinaht ? To jauta Wings / nhe ka winjam nulle wehl no teems Blehſcheems by mahʒiteeß / ko winjam darriet by ; bett ka Wings teems preekſch Wiſẜeems Ļaudeems Kaunu ghribb darriet / winjo leela Blehdibas dehļ / unnd ka ick kattris warraͤtu redſeht / ka willtighe tee to Kunghu JEſum ghribbeja pee⸗krahpt . Vnnd ka tee nu ka Maͤhmi ẜehſch / unnd nhe weenu Wahrdu nhe warr adbilldeht : aiſto ja tee buhtu ẜatʒijuſchi ; Taß nhe gir pareiſe ẜwaͤhdeenà [S. 2.302{282}] tà deenà dſeedinaht / tad warraͤtu teems JEſus CHRiſtus adbilldeht : Negg gir tad Ʒillwaͤhx labbaͤhx / nhe ka kahds Lohps ? Ja tad nu Ꞩwaͤhtà deenà juhß par weenu beßprahtighu Lohpu ẜoͤw abſchaͤlojeteeß / unnd to / ja taß kur ee⸗ſtiddſis / jeb apẜliekt ghribb / ißwaͤllkaht ; kapehtʒ juhß tad nhe ghribbaht labb darriet ẜwaͤhtà deenà / tam Ʒillwaͤkam / kaß auxtahx unnd preekſch Deewu dauds ʒeenighahx gir / nhe ka taß beßprahtiegs Lohps ? Bett ja taß nhe gir ghraͤhx ẜwaͤhtà deenà dſeedinaht / kapehtʒ juhß tad to nhe eeraͤdſaht / ka eß tohß Nheweſẜeļus waͤſẜaͤlus darru ẜwaͤhtà deenà . Jo juhß wehl to ghann ſinnaht ( ghribb JEſus Chriſtus ẜatʒiet ) ka wings Skohlas Wirſẜeneex bußmiegs tappa / kad eß to nabbagha Ꞩeewinju / kattra aßtohņ⸗padeßmitt ghaddus lieka ghaja / unnd nhe warreja no to Gharru tahß Nheweſẜelibas nomahkta / us⸗lukoht / unnd taißne ſtaighat / us weenu ẜwaͤhtu deenu waͤſẜaͤlu darriju . To ẜchee Willtineeki nomannidammi / ʒeete kluß / und nhe adbilldeja nheneeka . Bett JEſus CHRiſtus to darra tomaͤhr / kaß pareiſe gir / ẜakamp to Vhdens⸗ẜehrʒighu / unnd darra to waͤſẜaͤlu . Mahʒais M.D. taß nhe gir Ghraͤhx / ja tu tawam Tuwakam Ʒillwaͤkam / kad Wings Nhelaimeh gir / irr ẜwaͤhtà deenà palliedſi / und winjam tohß darrbus tahß Mielaͤſtibas parahdi . Taß gir teeß / ka Deews wiſẜenahdu Rohkas⸗darrbu ẜwaͤhtà deenà darriet / aisleedſis gir / ʒaur kattru taß Ʒillwaͤhx ais⸗kawejahß py Baſniʒas nahkt / Deewu peeluhkt / und winja Wahrdu klausẜiet / unnd tam kallpoht . Ka daſſch gir / kaß wiſẜu Neddeļu wiſẜus Kroghus iß⸗ſtaighajis Ꞩwehdeenà ee⸗ẜahk ſtrahdaht ; jeb wiſẜu Neddeļu ſtrahdajis / nhe to Ꞩwehdeenu nhe taupa / unnd ſtrahda us ẜawu Lauku / jeb Ꞩaͤhtà buhdams / und ſchkeet / ar to baggahtʒ tapt . Bett taß gir leels ghraͤhx . Klauſẜaita / ko taß wiſẜewalldiegs Deews ẜacka : Attminneeß to ẜwaͤhtu Deenu / ka tu to ẜwehti . Ꞩeſſchas deenas buhß to ſtrahdaht / unnd wiſẜu [S. 2.303{283}] tawu Darrbu nodarriet / bett ẜeptità deenà gir ta ẜwaͤhta deena tha Kungha tawa Deewa / tanny nhe buhß toͤw nhe kahdu darrbu darriet / neds tawam Daͤhlam / neds tawai Meitai / neds tawam Kallpam / neds tawai Kallponei / neds tawam Lohpam / neds tawam Ꞩweſſcheneekam / katters tawahß Wahrtieß ( jeb tawà Ꞩaͤhtà ) gir . Ko nu Deews ẜchinnies Wahrdohß toͤw gir pawehlejis / to buhß toͤw darriet / unnd to ẜwaͤhtu deenu pareiſe ẜwehtiet / nhe Rohkas darrbu ſtrahdadams / nhe arrdams / aͤtʒaͤdams / nhe pļaudams / ghrahbdams / nhe Riju kulldams / jeb timmaͤraͤdams / jeb auſdams / jeb ẜchuhdams / jeb Dahrſu rawaͤdama / jeb waͤhrbdama / jeb ſchkaͤttaͤraͤdama . Nu warraͤtu daẜch dohmaht ; Kad mann nhe buhß ſtrahdaht / ẜwehdeenà / tad eeẜchu eß ẜeereht : ka tad / Deewam ſchaͤhl / daẜch Ꞩwehdeenahß ẜlincko / us Ꞩaͤhtu ( us Wijas ) usghulleeß ſkattahß / unnd dohma nhe ſinnadams patʒ ko dohma / daſſch wahrtahß ſahle / und ghohſahß Ꞩauleh / daẜch pliete und dſeŗŗ / daẜch to Laiku kahwaͤdams ẜchurrp und turrp ſtaigha / daẜch ghawile / und dſeed kahdas dſeeßmas / ka ghohdiegs Ʒilllwaͤhx ẜarrtʒien no⸗ẜarrgſt klauẜidams . Taß nhe gir pareiſe . Ghribbi tu to Ꞩwehdeenu pareiſe unnd pehtʒ Deewa Wahrdu ẜwehtiet / tad ey Deewa Nammà / und wiß ar ko tu ʒauru Nhedeļļu tawu Debbeſẜu Taͤhwu ar nicknu{niecknu} Prahtu / nhelabbeems Wahrdeems / unnd ghrehʒigheems Darrbeems eſẜi apkaitenajis / to noluhds Deewam ar ghauſchahms Aſſarahms / no ẜirrds / mahʒais Patarus / klauſẜi Deewa Wahrdu / und jaͤmm to Waͤhrà und kuŗŗu Mahʒibu dſirrdejis / to jemmeeß tha py ẜirrds / ka tu ghribbi jo⸗prohjam pehtʒ to Mahʒibu dſiewoht . Ꞩaͤhtà nahʒis / ſtahſti taweems Baͤhrneems / und tawai Ꞩaimei / kattri Vgguns dehļ to ẜarrghadami / mahjahß pallickuſchi gir / to Deewa Wahrdu ko tu dſirrdejis eſẜi / unnd mahʒi tohß arridſan / ka teems Deewu adſiet unnd no ẜirrds peeluhkt / und pehtʒ winja Wahrdu dſiewoht buhß . Aiſto ta ẜacka [S. 2.304{284}] Deews taws Kungs : Tohß Wahrdus / kattrus eß toͤw ẜchodeen pawehļu / buhß toͤw Ꞩirrdy jembteeß / unnd buhß taweems Baͤhrneems tohß mahʒiet / und no teems runnaht . To Awi mehß ẜackam waͤſẜaͤlu aͤſẜam / kattra aͤhduẜi ghraͤmmo . Tu eſẜi weena Aws / ta Kungha JEſu Chriſti ; tapehtʒ buhß toͤw to dweſẜeles barribu attgraͤmmoht / taß gir / to klauſẜitu Deewa Wahrdu buhß toͤw attghadaht / und tawus Baͤhrnus mahʒidams no to attkal runnaht . Tha lieds arridſan buhß toͤw ẜwaͤhtà deenà nabbagheems Ļaudeems / kaß py Rohkas gir / ißdalliet / und tohß arridſan abdomaht / ka Deewa Wahrds toͤw mahʒa : Ghodi to Kunghu no tawu Manntu / tad taws Schkunis pills taps / und ko juhß weenam no teems maſaghakeems Brahļeems darraita / to darreta juhß Jeſu Chriſto / und taß jums to labbe darriẜchanu ſcheit laiʒighe und tur muhſchighe attmaxahß . Dohdeeta / tad taps jums dohts . Pils / ẜaſpaidiets / ẜakrattietʒ / unnd pahr⸗eijohts Maͤhrs / taps jums juhſẜà Klehpy ee⸗dohts . Tadehļ iß⸗dallitam Jß⸗allkuẜcham tawu Mais / tad tawa Ghaißme us⸗lehx / ka tee Rieta Ꞩarrkani / und taws Labbums peepehſche aux . Abdohma arridhſan tawu Mahʒetaju / ka toͤw taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pawils mahʒa / ẜatʒidams : ( Deews ) taß Kungs gir pawehlejis / ka teems / kattri to Ewangelium ẜludena ( und mahʒa ) no to Ewangelio baŗŗoteeß buhß . Vnd attkal ; kaß mahʒiets tohp ar to ( Deewa ) Wahrdu / tam buhß ißdalliet wiſẜenadu Labbumu tam ( katters to mahʒa . Vnd ko tu dohd labpraht / aiſto kaß preeʒighe dohd / to Deews mieļo . Bett ko tu attrau tawam Mahʒetajam / to Deews ohter teek toͤw ʒittà weetà attkalattrau / und buhß toͤw dohdt Laupitajam / Ꞩiŗŗeneekam und beßdeewigham Karrawieram / ko tu tawam ghohdigham Mahʒetajam nhe dohd . Ja tu nu / M.D. Deewam ẜawu ghohdu dohſẜi /unnd to [S. 2.305{285}] ẜwaͤhtu{ẜwehtu} Deenu tha ẜwehtieſẜi / ka tu taggad mahʒietʒ eſẜi / Kallpohſẜi winjam no Ꞩirrds / tad Wings par toͤw arridſan ẜoͤw abſchaͤloſẜeeß / tawu Rohkas Darrbu ẜwehties / und tawu Maiſiet ghauẜenahß / unnd ja kahda Nhelaime pehtʒ Deewa Prahtu lehxeeß / tad Wings toͤw attkal eepreeʒenahß / und ja kaß ſuddieß{ẜuddieß} / to Wings toͤw attdohß / ka Wings patʒ ẜohlijis gir : Kaß mann ghohda / to eß attkal ghribbu ghohdaht . Bett ko Deews ẜohla / to turr Wings teeẜcham / und tha Kungha Atʒ ſkattahß us teems / kattri to bieſtahß / kattri us winja Schaͤlaſtibu ʒerreh / ka Wings to Dwehſẜeles attpeſti no Nahwes / und baŗŗo tohß dahrghà Laikà . Nu warri tu ar preeʒighu und titʒighu Mutt und Ꞩirrdi ẜatʒiet / dſeedadams : No Deewu nhe ghribbu eß attſtaht / Aiſto Wings nhe attſtahw no mann / Waͤdd mann us ihſtaͤnu Ʒeļļu / Ʒittahd eß ļohte allohtu : Ꞩneeds mann ẜawu Rohku Rytohß unde Wackarohß Wings mann labb peebaŗŗo / Kuŗŗa Semmeh buhdams . Gir tawa Dwehſẜele nhewaͤſẜaͤla no leeleems Ghraͤkeems nomahta : Redſi / JEſus Chriſtus ghribb toͤw ar ẜawu ſchehlighu Rohku apkamt / und tawu Dwehſẜel dſeedinaht / ka Wings ẜchim Ʒillwaͤkam darrija . Tawi Ghraͤki toͤw wairs nhe ſpaidieß / und us tawu Ꞩirrdi nhe ghullehß / aiſto JEſus Chriſtus gir taß Kunngs / katters ẜacka ʒaur to Mutt tha ẜwaͤhta Koninja Dawida : Manna Rohka to usturrehß / und manns Aelkohns to ſtipprenahß / ka tu brienodams ẜatʒieſẜi : Kur gir tahds Deews / ka tu eſẜi / katters tohß Ghraͤkus peedohd / unnd attlaiſch tohß Noſeghumus teems Attlickuẜcheems ẜawas Dallibas / katters ẜawu Dußmibu muhſchighe nhe turr / aiſto [S. 2.306{286}] Wings gir ſchehliegs / Wings ẜoͤw attkal par mums abſchehlohſẜieß / muhſẜus Noſeghummus ẜlahpehß / und wiſẜus muhſẜus Ghraͤkus Juhres Dſiļļumà eemettieß . Daſſch kļuhſt ẜakamptʒ / bett nhe arr labbu Ꞩirrdi / ka Wings nabbags Kallps / katters ẜawu Beedri und Liedſe⸗Kallpu / ʒeļļohßmaͤsdameeß luhdſe / wings ghribbaͤtu tam ghaidiet tohß ẜimbtus Ghroſẜchus / katters ẜchiß ohtram parradà by / bett wings nhe ghribbeja / ẜakampe ẜcho / und ẜhņaudſe / ghribbaͤdams to tudeļļ nomurriet . Joſua / to Jſraeliteŗo Leels⸗Kungs licka to Koninju no Ai dſiewu ẜaghrahbt / und pehtʒ py Kohku pakahrt lieds Wakkaram . Tada Ꞩakampẜchana / tada Ꞩaghrahbẜchana gir ghruta . Bett toͤw / katters tu tawus Ghraͤkus atſieſti / unnd Deewu ghodi / toͤw apkamp taws Kungs JEſus Chriſtus arr ẜawahms ſchehlighahms Rokahms / kattras Wings ʒauru Deenu iß⸗ſteep / unnd ghribbaͤtu toͤw labpraht py ẜoͤw dawillckt . Ar ẜawahms mielighahms Rohkahms apkamp Wings toͤw / ſpeeſch toͤw py ẜawu Kruhti / und liexmojahß ar wiſẜu ẜawu Spaͤhku / kaß Winjam Debbeſẜieß gir / kad tu attſtahjeeß no Ghraͤkeems . Vnd ja tu ka Ʒillwaͤhx kluhpi / tad pajaͤmm Wings toͤw ar ẜawu Rohku / und paʒeļļ toͤw aukſcham : Aiſto taß Kunngs usturr wiſẜus / kattri krieht / und paʒeļļ noẜiſti gir . Gir mirrſtama Deena klaht / und toͤw buhß to Ʒeļļu wiſẜas Meeſẜas ſtaighaht / tad ẜaghrahb JEſus Chriſtus tawu Dwehſẜel undee ẜlaͤhds to tick ſtippre ẜawà Rohkà / ka to nheweenam nhe buhß ißraut / nhe kadas Mokas nhe buhß to aißkahrt . Redſi / ka JEſus Chriſtus to ʒeeni / kaß Winju ʒeeni . Eſẜi nheweſẜaͤls py tawas Meeſẜas / Jeſus CHRJſtus ghribb toͤw / ja Wings nomanna / ka ta Weſẜeliba toͤw labba gir / unnd tu waͤſẜaͤls tappis / leelakohß Ghraͤkohß nhe eekrieti / attkall waͤſẜaͤlu darriet / ihten ka ẜcho Vhdens⸗Ꞩehrdſighu Ʒillaͤku . Wings ẜaẜeen tawas Ꞩahpes / Wings toͤw liegho / Wings ta[S. 2.307{287}] wus ẜadauſitus Kaulus weeglus dara / Wings toͤw eepreeʒina / und toͤw us tawahms Kahjahms usʒilla / ka tu ar pillu preeʒighu Mutt dſeedaht und ẜatʒiet warri : Nu ẜlahwe manna Dwehſẜele to Kunghu / Wiß kaß eekſchan mann gir / winja Wahrdu / Ꞩawu Labbedarriẜchanu taß wairo / Nhe aißmirrſti to / O manna Ꞩirrds / Gir toͤw peedewis tawus Ghraͤkus / Vnd dſeedina tawu leelu Nheweſẜelibu / Taß atpeſti tawu nabbaghu Dſiewibu / Jaͤmm toͤw ẜawà Klehpy Ar baggatu Preeku peepillda . Vnnd to dohd jums und mann / und mums wiſẜeems Deews taß Taͤhws / Daͤhls unnd ẜwaͤhtʒ Gharrs / ẜlawaͤhtʒ unnd ghodaͤhtʒ ẜcheit laiʒighe und tur muhſchighe / no mums und wiſẜeems Chriſtiteems Ļaudeems / Amen / Amen . 

Teil 2.23

Eine andere Predigt am 17 . Sontag nach Trinitatis / Luc. 14. 

To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / ka taß Kunngs JESVS Weeſẜibahs py weenu Wariſeeri buhdams / weenu Vhdena Ꞩehrdſighu Ʒillwaͤka waͤſẜaͤlu darrijiß / und tohß Weeſẜis mahʒijis gir / apraxta taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliſts Lucas / ẜawà Ghramatà ʒaͤttortà padeßmittà Weetà / und ſkann tee Wahrdi juhſẜà Wallodà tha : 

VNd taß notickahß / ka JESVS nahʒe weena Wirſẜeneekà Nammà / ẜwaͤhtà Deenà to Mais ehſt . Vnd tee ghluneja us Winju / etc . 

[S. 2.308{288}] 

MJeļi Draughi / nhe dauds labbas Deenas taß Kungs JESVS Chriſtus uhs ẜchahß Paſẜaules redſige unnd meeſẜighe ſtaighadams / redſejis gir . Aiſto jebſche Wings ick⸗kattram / Bagghatam unnd Nabbagham / kaß to peeluhdſe / labpraht paliedſeja / und teems dauds labb darrija ; tomehr Wings nhe warreja ißtickt teems Wariſeeŗeems / tee Winju ļohte eeniedeja . Kapehtʒ ? Tapehtʒ / manns Draugs / ka JEſus Chriſtus us teems Wariſeeŗeems barehß / ka tee tick beßdeewighe unnd arr Willtu ween dſiewoja / und nhe pareiſe Deewa Wahrdu maʒija . Tadehļ arridſan Deewa Daͤhls ʒaur ta Koninja Dawida Mutt ſchaͤhlojahß / ẜatʒidams : Jckdeenas teems Raiſa gir ar manneems Wahrdeems / wiſẜa winjo Dohmaẜchana gir / ka tee man ļaun darra / tee turrahß kohpa / und ghluna / ſkattahß us manneem papehſcheem / ka tee mannu Dwehſẜel ẜaghrahbt warr . Tomehr pehtʒ tadu Dußmu taß Kunngs Jeſus nheneeka baͤhdadams / darra to / kaß winjam ja⸗darra / und kadehļ wings no ẜawu Debbeſẜo Taͤhwu ẜuhtietʒ by / ka Wings arridſan ẜacka : Eß ghribbu runnaht ( und mahʒiet ) to Taißnibu eekſchan tahß leelas Draudſes : Redſi / Eß nhe ghribbu ẜawu Mutt licktee aisbahſt / Kungs to ſinni tu . Ꞩcho raͤdſam mehß arridſan eekſchan ẜcho ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelio / kad mehß dſirrdam laſẜoht / ka tee Waiſeeŗi us tha Kunngha JEſu CHRJſti Darbu ſkattijuſcheeß / und us winja Wahrdu klauſẜijuẜcheeß gir / ghribbaͤdami to ẜaghrahbt / und ghuſtiet . Tapehtʒ tee arridſan Winju Weeſẜibahß luhds / paſtaͤllaͤdami ẜchimm brieſcham / ka weenam Vhdaͤnu⸗ẜehrdſigham Ʒillwaͤkam tanny paſſcha Nammàby nahkt / ka tee warraͤtu redſeht / arrieg taß Kungs Chriſtus [S. 2.309{289}] Ꞩwaͤhtà Deenà bauditohß to Nheweſẜeli dſeedenaht . Bett taß Kungs / katters wiſẜas leetas raͤds und papreekſche ſinna / taß teems tadu Kaunu darra / ka tee wiſẜi kluſẜe ʒeeſch . Vnd nomannidams / ka tee Weeſẜis dſaͤnnahß auxtaka Weetà ẜehdeht / mahʒa Wings tohß ar weenu krahßnu Liedſibu / ka teems turreteeß / unnd allaſch abdohmaht buhß : Kaß ẜoͤw patʒ auxtenajahß / tam buhß ſaͤmmotam tapt . Mehß ẜchim brieſcham ghribbam apdomaht und pahrluhkoht / kaß tha Wariſeera Nammà gir notitʒis . Taß Kungs JEſus Chriſtus dohd mums ẜawu ẜwaͤhtu Gharru / ka mehß ẜcho Ꞩwaͤhtu Deenu pareiſe ẜwehtiet warram / Amen . 

KAd mehß / Mieļi Draughi / ẜchinny Wariſeeŗa Nammà ee⸗eetam / und tahß Weeſẜibas aplukojam / tad attrohdam mehß / ka weens Wirßneex no teems Wariſeeŗeems tahß Weeſẜibas turr / taß no Kunghu JEſum / und ʒittus Weeſẜis gir ẜawà Nammà Weeſẜibahß luhdſis . Aiſto tha ẜacka ẜchiß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliums : Taß notickahß / ka JESVS nahʒe weena Wirrßneeka Nammà / ẜwaͤhta Deenà to Mais ehſt . Vnd tee ghluneja us Winju . Taß Kunngs JEſus nhe nahk nhe luhktʒ / ka daſſch ſpeeſchahß Weeſẜibahß / und gir tick dauds luhktʒ / ka Ꞩunns : bett Chriſtus JEſus nahk luhktʒ . Taß Wariſeeŗo Wirrßneex nhe luhdſe to ar labbu Ꞩirrdi / to arridſan taß Kungs JEſus ghann ſinnaja / aiſto Wings wehl attminnejahß / ka ʒiti Wariſeeŗi nhe ẜenn us winju Skohlà buhdami / ẜatʒija / ey ara / und ey nohſt no ẜchennenes . Ka Draugs Wings nhe by Weeſẜibahß luhktʒ / bett ka tee Blehẜchi winjam warraͤtu Nhelaimeh eeweſt . To ẜacka irr taß Ewangeliſts Lucas ẜcheitan : Tee ghluneja us Winju . Tee ghribbeja ißklauſẜiteeß / arrieg tee warraͤtu ko redſeht und dſirrdeht / ko tee warraͤtu tam Semmes⸗[S. 2.310{290}] Ꞩogham Pontio Pilato / jeb tam Koninjam Herodes / jeb teems Auxteems Baſniʒa⸗Kungheems attẜatʒiet / to Kunnghu JEſum apmaͤloht / und kada Nhelaimeh eeweſt . Redſi / tha ghluneja taß Ꞩaimneex ar ẜaweems Weeſẜeems us to Kunnghu JEſum . Ꞩcheitan / Manns Draugs / tohp toͤw rahdietʒ / ka allaſch / unnd irr taggad tahdi Ļaudis tohp attraſti / kattri labbus Wahrdus ſinna doht / bett ta Ꞩirrds teems pilla Blehdibas und Willtibas gir . Ꞩchiß Wariſeers Chriſtum luhds Weeſẜibahß py ẜawu Ghalldu / bett Wings ghribb ẜcho peekrahpt . Tadi Ʒillwaͤki gir preekſch Deewu und ghodigheems Ļaudeems weena nheghanta Leeta . Tee gir tee / no kattreems taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Konings Dawids ẜacka : Tee runna mielighe arr ẜawu Tuwaku / und teems gir nickna Ꞩirrds . Winjo Mutte gir ghluddenaka nhe ka Ꞩweeſts / unnd teems gir tattſche Karrſch Prahtà / winjo Wahrdi gir miextaki nhe ka Oelljeß / und gir tomaͤhr plicki Sohbini . Winji dohd labbus Wahrdus / bett Ꞩirrdy lahd tee . Teems Deews leelu Ꞩohdibu dohß / ka teems nhe buhß puß⸗muhſchu dſiewoht . Tahds ghodiegs Puttniß by taß Joabs / taß ẜweiʒenaja und ſkuhpſtija to Amaſam / und tomehr tick mielighe turraͤdammeeß / taß to ohtru ſlaͤppaͤne noduhre . Tahds by Judas / tha Kunngha JEſu CHriſti Apuſtuļo weens / no kattru Wings ſchaͤlojahß : Tu eſẜi manns Beedris / Ꞩarrgs unnd Radda Wiers / kattri mehß ka Draughi kohpa dſiewojam / unnd ſtaighajam kohpà Deewa⸗Namma . To jemm waͤhra / Manns Draugs / und ẜarrghajeeß par tadu Willtibu / und blehdighu Ꞩirrdi . Deews tohß raͤds / unnd attkal attradieß / tee willtighi Ļaudis notaͤck ka Vhdens / ẜacka taß Konings Dawids . Tai miextai Mehlei / und willtighai Ꞩirrdei nhe buhß us Deewa Kallnu / taß gir Debbeſẜo Wallſtibà nahkt . [S. 2.311{291}] Vnd tu{to} ohtris mahʒais / ka tu ghuddrighe ẜchinny Paſẜauleh dſiewo . Tu dſirrdi / ka Deewam ſchaͤhl / leels Willts ſtarrpan teems Ʒillwaͤka⸗Baͤhrneems gir : tapehtʒ / dſiewo ar ick⸗kattru mielighe / bett ſtarrp tuhxtoẜcheems mohke weenam titʒi . Nhe us⸗titʒi nhe weenam Draugham / ja tu nhe eſẜi to Baͤhdahß adſinnis / mahʒa Syrachs . Laideeta mums nu wehl ẜchinnies Weſẜiebahs apſkattiteeß ; teitan attrodam mehß to Kunnghu JEſum ẜaͤdohẜchu . Bett pirrms tee Weeſẜis wiſẜi apẜaͤhdahß / eeraugha JEſus Chriſtus weenu Nheweſẜaͤlu Ʒillwaͤku / katters no to Vdaͤna⸗Ꞩaͤhrghu itt ustullʒis und uspampis by . Kaß ſinna / negg tee Wariſeeŗi paſſchi ẜcho Nheweſẜeli tanny Nammà paſtellejuſchi / ghribbaͤdami ẜajuſt / arrieg taß Kungs Chriſtus to Ꞩwehta⸗Deenà dſedenatu ? Bett ko darra JEſus Chriſtus ? Wings wiſẜas leetas ſinnadams waiʒa lieds tam Ꞩaimneekam / ka irr ʒittahms Weeſẜeems / Arrieg taß klatohß / Ꞩwehtà⸗deenà weenu Nheweſẜelu Ʒillwaͤku dſeedenaht ? Jemmeeta waͤhra / ẜchee Wariſeeŗi tha dohwaja : jeb taß JEſus no Naʒareth ẜcho Ʒillwaͤku weſẜaͤlu darries / jeb nhe ; tad tomehr Wings to Baußlu pahrkahps . Peſties wings to us ẜcho Ꞩwehtu Deenu / tad warram mehß to apẜuhdſeht / ka Wings to Treſẜchu Baußlu gir pahrkapis / katters tha ſkann : Toͤw buhß to Ꞩwaͤhtu Deenu ẜwehtiet . Attkal / ja Wings tam nabbagham Ʒillwaͤkam ẜchodeen nhe paliedſehß no ẜawas Nheweſẜelibas / tad ghribbam mehß ẜatʒiet / Wings nhe mieļo ẜawu Tuwaku / ka ẜoͤw paſſchu . Bett taß Kungs JEſus ſinnadams ẜcho Blehẜcho Ꞩirrdes / waiʒa / ko tee ſchkeet / arrieg klahtohß Ꞩwaͤhtà Deenà weenu Nheweſẜaͤlu Ʒillwaͤku dſeedenaht und weſẜaͤlu darriet ? Tee Wariſeeŗi nhe ſinnaja / ko teem by adbilldeht . Aiſto ja tee ẜatʒietu / taß ghann peedaͤrroteeß / ka irr ẜwaͤtà Deenà warraͤtu paliedſeht weenam Nheweſẜeļam / tad tee paſẜchi prett ẜoͤw runnatu / und buhtu wellt bijis / ko tee ẜawa Prahtà [S. 2.312{292}] by jaͤhmuẜcheeß . Ꞩatʒietu tee attkal / Nhe / taß nhe klahjahß Ꞩwaͤhtà Deenà dſeedenaht / tad teems nhe buhtu kahda Waina bijuſẜi / to Kunghu JEſum apẜuhdſeht . Tapehtʒ ʒeeſch tee itt kluſẜe . Ka te nu nheneeka adbild / tad jaͤmm JEſus Chriſtus ẜcho Nheweſẜeli / unnd darra to Atʒeems redſoht tudeļļ weenà Atʒesmirrkly waͤſẜaͤlu{weſẜaͤlu} / taß Vhdens⸗Tulßnis ẜehſchahß / und ẜaplaxt / und tohp taß / katters taggad uspampis by / diſchane teews . Ka nu taß Kunngs JEſus ẜcho Nheweſẜeli weſẜaͤlu darridams nhe by ghraͤkojis / neds kahdu Baußlu pahrkahpis / rahda Wings arr weenu Liedſibu / ẜatʒidams us to Ꞩaimneeku unnd us teems Weeſẜeems : Kaß gir juhſẜo ſtarrpà / kamm ẜaws Wehrſẜis jeb Eſelis Ackà eekriet / unnd taß to dudeļļļ nhe ißwaͤllk Ꞩwaͤhtà Deenà . Ja juhß tad nhe ghraͤkojeeta weenam beßprahtigham Lohpam paliedſaͤdammi / tad eß itt nheneeka ghraͤkojis buhſchu ẜchim Ʒillwaͤkam Ꞩwehtà Deenà palliedſaͤdams / aiſto jo Ʒillwaͤhx auxtahx gir / nhe ka kahds Lohps . Vnd tee nhe warreja winjam us teems Wahrdeems nheneeka adbilldeht / teem by to Kunnghu JEſum ar Meeru lickt . Mahʒaiteeß ẜcheitan / Manni Draughi / kahds ghodiegs und baggahts Weeſẜis taß Kungs JEſus Chriſtus gir / Wings to Mais / to Barribu / kattra winjam preekſcha ʒaͤllta tohp / ghodighe attmaxa . Ꞩwehtietʒ gir taß Namms / kurr Wings mahjo / ẜwehtietʒ gir taß Ghallds / unnd ghauſẜenata gir ta Maiſe / py kattras taß Kungs JEſus arridſan ẜehſch . Ꞩcheitan attmaxa Wings to Malltiet / to Nheweſẜeli dſeedenadams . Kahſahß buhdams eekſchan Canà / eeſchkingkoja Wings teems jauneems Ļaudeems krahßnu Wienu / unnd attmaxa tha lieds pillam ko Wings ar ẜaweems Mahʒekleems ap⸗ehdis by . Wings nahgdams py Ʒacheo / attmaxaja tam ẜawu Meelaͤſtu paliedſaͤdams tam py Meeſẜas und Dwehſẜeles / aiſto tha Wings ẜacka : Ꞩcho[S. 2.313{293}] deen gir ẜchai Nammai palliedſiba notickuſẜi . Maria / Martha und Laʒarus daſche reis to Kunnghu JEſum Weeſẜibahß lughuẜchi / to Labb⸗darriẜchanu Wings pehtʒ tha attmaxaja / kad Laʒarus no leelu Ꞩaͤhrghu pahrjaͤmbtʒ nomirra / tad Wings to attkal no Mirroņeems usmohdenaja . Tapehtʒ / Manns Draugs{Drauds} / darri ko darridams / peeluhko ka taß Kungs JEſus arridſan py tawu Ghalldu ẜehſch / luhds to ar taweem Pahtareems / Wings ghodighe toͤw attmaxahß / und tu redſehſẜi / ka Winja Paͤhdas wiſẜur no Tauku pileht pill . Nahk kahds nabbags Ʒillwaͤhx / dohd tam kaß toͤw py Rohkas / JEſus Chriſtus toͤw attmaxahß . Aiſto tha Wings ẜohla : Kaß weenu no ẜcheems maſakeems dſirrden ar weenu Bickeri auxta Vhdena / patteeß eß ẜacku jums / taß nhe palix tam nhe⸗attmaxahtʒ . Ja tad JEſus Chriſtus weenu auxtu Vhdens Mallku ghribb attmaxaht ; tad Wings jo wehl wairahk Pattackas⸗Allus⸗Maͤddas⸗Mallku attmaxahß . Ock / Manns Draugs / labb tam / ẜwehtietʒ gir taß Ʒillwaͤhx / kattru ẜchiß Kungs ißwehle / unnd py ẜoͤw peelaiſchahß / tam gir baggata Ꞩwehtiba / ẜacka taß Konings Dawids . Wehl mahʒaiteeß / Manni Draughi / kahduß Darrbus jums buhß Ꞩwaͤhtahß Deenahß darriet . To Ꞩweh⸗deenu buhß mums ẜwehtiet / ta gir ta Kungha CHRiſti Deena . Aiſto tanny Deenà JEſus Chriſtus muhſẜo Kungs und Peſtitais gir peedſimmis / apghraiſietʒ / und aukſcham ʒehleeß no teems Mirroņeems : Tanny Deenà gir JEſus Chriſtus teems Apuſtuļeems to Ꞩwehtu Gharru no Debbeſẜu redſighe noẜuhtijiß . Tadehļ mehß Chriſtiti Ļaudis arridſan to Ꞩwehdeenu ẜwehtijam / und Deewam kallpojam / ka tee Juddo⸗Ļaudis to Ꞩeß⸗deenu ẜwehtija . Tanny paſſchà Ꞩweh⸗deenà / und wiſẜohß Ꞩwehtkohß buhß mums no wiſẜenadu Darrbu attſtaht / laid ta buhtu kada buhdama . Toͤw nhe buhß arrt / etʒeht / [S. 2.314{294}] pļawt / kullt / wehrpt / und ẜchuht / und tha projam ; bett Deewam buhß toͤw kallpoht / Baſniʒà eedams / Deewa Dſeeßmus unnd Pahtarus mahʒidameeß / unnd dſeedadams / Deewam pateickdams par wiſẜu Labbu / ko Wings toͤw to ißghajuẜchu Neddeļļu paradijiß gir / noluhds Deewam tawus Ghraͤkus / klauſẜi Deewa Wahrdu / und jauʒeeß tha dſiewoht / ka taws Mahʒetais toͤw aran Deewa Wahrdu und Ghramatu mahʒa . Laid tawi Baͤhrni und Ꞩaime arridſan eejuhxt Deewam par Ghodu dſiewoht . Dohma / ẜacka Deews patʒ / ka tu to ẜwaͤhtu Deenu ẜwehti . Ꞩeſẜchas Deenas buhß toͤw ſtradaht / unnd wiſẜu tawu Darrbu noſtradaht / bett ẜeptita Deena gir ta Ꞩwehta Deena ta Kungha tawa Deewa / tad nhe buhß toͤw nhekadu Darrbu darriet / neds taws Daͤhls / neds tawa Meita / neds taws Kallps / neds tawa Kallpone / nedds taws Lohps / neds taws Ꞩweſẜcheneex / ( Ebuweetis ) kaß tawahß Wahrtieß ( und appakſchan taweems Paſpahrņeems ) gir . Aiſto ẜeẜchahß Deenahß gir Deews taß Kunngs Debbeſẜu und Semm darrijiß / und to Juhri / und wiſẜu kaß turr eekſchan gir / und duſẜeja ẜeptità Deenà / tadehļ ẜwehtija taß Kungs to Ꞩwehtu Deenu . Bett tomehr ſinni / Manns Draugs / ka toͤw attwehlaͤhtʒ gir daſſch Darrbs / Ꞩwehtà⸗Deenà darriet . Kad Ꞩirrineeki Ꞩweh⸗deenà ẜiŗŗo / tad nhe gir toͤw aisleektʒ tawu Nabbadſibu / ko Deews toͤw gir dehwis / ẜlehpt und ghlabboht : Kad Vgguns⸗Ghraͤhx Ꞩweh⸗deenà laͤtʒahß / nhe gir toͤw aisleektʒ / Vhdeni peeneſt und dſehſt . Warri tu tawam Kaiminjam und ʒittam Ʒillwaͤkam kahdà leetà peetetʒeht und paliedſeht / tohß Nheweſẜeļus aplukoht / teems Vbbagheems Maiſes Ghabbalu noghreeſt / taß nhe gir toͤw aisleektʒ . Nhe eſẜi tu ween weens Klauſẜitais / bett arridſan weens Darritais pehtʒ Deewa Mahrdu . [S. 2.315{295}] Bett Deewam ẜchaͤhl / ka tohp ẜchy Mahʒiba no daſchu Nhebehdneeku pahrkahpta . Wings ẜehſch Deenas diwi / trieß / py Klappi / ſteep ka Aſẜaras no Atʒeem laͤtʒ / pehtʒ Ꞩaͤhtà pahrnahʒiß / weenà Deenà ghribb Wings to Darrbu panahkt / nhe taupidams irr to Ꞩweh⸗deenu . Daſſch aŗŗ / etʒe / pļau / ʒaͤhrt / daͤdſena / kŗau Liedumu / kad ʒitti Ļautiņi Deewa Wahrdohß eet / waiʒahſẜi tu / kapehtʒ wings Ꞩwehdeenà ſtrahda / und nhe eet arridſan Baſniʒà ? Tad addbilldehß toͤw tahds Blehds ; Wai tad Ꞩwehdeenà arridſan nhe buhß ehſt ? Bett klauſẜais tu Deewa⸗Pullghotais / nhe eſẜi tu muhſcham dſirrdejiß / ko taß ẜwehtʒ Apuſtuls Pawils ẜacka : Nhe allojeeteeß / Deews nhe leekahß apẜmeeteeß . Kad ick⸗kattris dſaͤnnahß us ẜawu Nammu / bett Deewa Namms tuckſch palleek / tad ghribb attkal Deews Baddu unnd Kaŗŗu tadà Semme ẜuhtiet / teems buhß ehſt und nhe pee⸗ehſteeß / teems buhß Ʒaurumainà Maiſẜà eebehrt / ko tee krahſta . Nhe gir taß teeß / manns Draugs / ka tee wißleelahki Ghraͤki noteek Ꞩwehdeenà / und ʒittohß Ꞩwehtkohß ? Kad mehß no kadas Nhelaimes dſirrdam / und waiʒajam / kad ta gir notickuſẜi ? tad ẜacka / Tanny{Tannny} Ꞩwehdeenà taß kļua nodurrtʒ / tanny Ꞩwehdeenà tee unnd tee gir ẜabahruſcheeß / tannieß Ꞩwehtkohß ẜchi unnd ta par Mauku tappuſẜi / tanny Ꞩwehdeenà ẜchiß unnd taß peedſehreeß apẜlieka / und kaß warr wiſẜadu Nhelaim und Ghraͤku ẜchinny briedy ißſtahſtiet / kattra Ꞩwehdeenohß noteek ? Vnd wiſẜa tahda Nhelaime ghaddahß / kad tee Ļaudis to Ꞩwehdeenu nhe ẜwehti pareiſe . Nu / manns Draugs / ey ẜwehdeenà Baſniʒà / pateitʒ Deewam no Ꞩirrds dibben par wiſẜu Labbu / ko wings toͤw ißghajuẜchà Neddeļa paradijiß und dehwis gir / noluhds Winjam tawus Ghraͤkus / arr kattreems tu Winju eſẜi apkaitenajiß / luhds ka Wings toͤw / tawus Baͤhrnus / Ꞩaim / Lohpus / Aehkas / ja tawu Meeſẜu und Dwehſẜel par wiſẜenadu Nhelaim ghlabboht unnd [S. 2.316{296}] pa⸗ẜarrghaht / tha lieds arridſan ẜcho nahkoẜcha Neddeļà toͤw ar ẜawu Ꞩwehtu Gharru klaht ſtaweht / tawas Rohkas Darrbu ẜwehtiet und ſkubbenaht / par wiſẜenadeems Ghraͤkeems toͤw paẜarrghaht ghribbaͤtu . Redſi / Tahdas Leetas irr Baſniʒà / irr Ꞩaͤhtà buhdams / kad tu apdomahſẜi / tad toͤw ghann ihß Laix taps / ja tu wehl tahß Mahʒibas / kattras tu no tawu Mahʒetaju Baſniʒà dſirrdejis / arridſan attghraͤmmohſẜi / ka kada Aws to attghraͤmmo / ko winja ehduſẜi gir . Taß buhß toͤw no Meeſẜas und Dwehſẜeles labb . Kungheem / Muiſchas⸗Kungheem / Waggharehm / Jahtneekeem / ( Stahraſteem / Cubiaſẜeem / ) buhß arridſan uslukoht / ka winjo Ļaudis to Ꞩwehdeenu pareiſe ẜwehti . Ja tee to nhe darra / tad tee ar ẜchweſẜcheems Ghraͤkeems apghraͤkojahß . Deewa Ꞩohdibu tee nhe ißbehx . Mehß laſẜam Deewa Ghramatà / Nehemias redſaͤdams / ka Ļaudis Ꞩwehta⸗Deena ſtrahdaja und Labbibu eewedde / eekſchan Jeruſalemes / ẜatʒija Wings us teems Wirrſẜeneekeems ; Kahda ta leeta gir / ko juhß darreeta / und pahrkapeeta to Ꞩwehtu⸗deenu ? Negg muhſẜo Taͤhwi arridſan tha darrija / unnd muhſẜo Deews wiſẜu ẜchadu Nhelaim par mums und muhſẜo Pili pahrwedde . Vnd juhß to Dußmibu par Jſrael wehl krahjaht . Wings / taß Nehemias licka Wackarohß tahß Wahrtiß aisẜlehkt / und by teems Pretʒeneekeems par to Ꞩwehtu⸗Deenu ara pallickt . Redſeeta / Manni Draughi / taß by weens ghodiegs Kunngs / Wings nhe ghribbeja ļaut / Ꞩwehta Deenà nhekahdu Darrbu ſtradaht / bett teems Ļaudeems by Deewam kallpoht . To by muhſẜeems Kunngheems arridſan darriet . Nhe gir taß Kauns ? nhe gir taß Ghraͤx ? kad ʒitti ghodighi Ļaudiß Deewa Namma gir / tad ʒitti us Lauku ſtrahda / waͤdd Ꞩuhduß / ẜehſch Krohgha / pliete / Atʒiß ẜlauʒidami / Ʒittʒ ʒittu Blehdibu darra / ẜehſch arà us Kappẜehti / unnd runna ka ghodi[S. 2.317{297}] gham Ʒillwaͤkam Auſẜiß ẜuhſt dſirrdoht . Weena Weetà Deewa Wahrdu mahʒa / ohtra Weetà attkal lahd . Tahdu beßdeewighu Dſiewoẜchanu nhe attſtahß Deews / katters wiſẜas leetas reds / nhe⸗ẜohditu . Wings ẜohdieß Kunghus und Ļaudis . Tapehtʒ / O Semme / Semme / Semme / klauſẜi Deewa Wahrdu . Ꞩchimm brieẜcham ghann . Taß ſchehliegs Deews ghribbaͤtu mums ar ẜawu Schaͤlaſtibu klaht ſtaweht / ka mehß ẜchahß Mahʒibas paturreht / und pehtʒ tahms muhſẜu Dſiewoẜchanu eeſtahdiet warram / Amen / Amen . <h teil="Matth. 23,34–46">Evangelium am achtʒehenden Sontag nach Trinitatis / Matth. 22. 

To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / Ko tick lieds tee Deßmitti Deewa Baußly / ka arridſan / ko taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliums und tha Mahʒiba no CHRJSTV JESV arr ihſẜeems Wahrdeems mums mahʒa / laſẜam mehß apraxtitu py to ẜwehtu Ewangeliſtu Mattheo / diwi deßmita unnd ohtra Weetà / unnd ſkann tee Wahrdi juhſẜa Wallodà tha : [S. 2.318{298}] 

KAd tee Wariſeeri dſirrdeja / ka JEſus teems Saduceereems to Mutt aisbahſis by / ẜapullʒejahß tee . Vnd weens ſtarpan teems / weens Raxtamahʒetais kahrdenaja to / und ẜatʒija : Meiſteri / kurrſch gir taß auxtakais Baußliß eekſchan to Baußlu ? Bett JESVS ẜatʒija us to : Toͤw buhß Deewu tawu Kunnghu mieļoht no wiſẜas Ꞩirrdes / no wiſẜas Dwehſẜeles / no wiſẜu Prahtu . Taß gir taß auxtakaiß Baußlis . Bett taß ohtris gir tam liedſaͤns . Toͤw buhß tawu Tuwaku mieļoht ka ẜoͤw paſẜchu . Ꞩchinnieß diweijohß Baußließ karrajahß wiſẜi Baußlis und tee Proweetes . [S. 2.319{299}] Kad nu tee Wariſeeri kohpa by / jautaja tohß JEſus / und ẜatʒija : Ko ſkeetahß juhß no Chriſto ? Ka Daͤhls gir taß ? Winji ẜatʒija / Dawida . Taß ẜatʒija us teem : Ka ẜautʒ to tad Dawids Gharrà par Kunnghu ? Ꞩatʒidams : Taß Kunngs ẜatʒija us mannu Kunnghu / ẜehdeeß pa mannu labbu Rohku / teekams eß tawus Eenaidneekus leeku par Pamaͤßlu tawahm Kahjahm . Ja to nu Dawids par Kunnghu ẜautʒ / ka gir taß tad winja Daͤhls ? Vnd nhe weens nhe ſinnaja tam kahdu Wahrdu adbilldeht / und nhe drieſteja arridſan no tahß Deenahß tam wairs jautaht . 

MJeļi Draughi / Ꞩchiß ẜwaͤhtʒ preekſchelaſẜietʒ Ewangeliums peedaͤrr pirmajan kahrtan eekſchan wiſẜeems Deßmitteems Deewa Baußleems / kattri mums rahda und mahʒa / ka mums buhß tick labb prett Deewu ka arridſan prett muhſẜu Tuwaku Ʒillwaͤku turreteeß / arr Wahrdu tha / ka JEſus Chriſtus ẜcheitan ẜacka : Toͤw buhß Deewu tawu Kunnghu mieļoht no wiſẜu Ꞩirrdi / no wiſẜu Dwehſẜel / no wiſẜu Prahtu . Taß gir taß auxtakaiß Baußliß . Bett taß ohtris gir tam liedſaͤns : Toͤw buhß tawu Tuwaku mieloht / ka ẜoͤw paſſchu . Ꞩchinnieß diweijohß Baußließ karrajahß wiß Baußlis und tee Proweetes . Wiß ko mehß eekſchſan Moſis Ghramatahms / unnd py teems ẜwehteems Proweteems laſẜam / ka mums Deewu unnd muhſẜu Tuwaku Ʒillwaͤku mieļoht [S. 2.320{286}] buhß / taß kluhſt wiß eekſchan ẜcheems Wahrdeems mahʒietʒ / ka arridſan taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils raxta : Arr ihſſeems Wahrdeems ẜackoht no to Baußlu : ( taß mahʒa mums ) to Mielaͤſtibu no ſchkieſtas Ꞩirrds / und no labbas Ꞩirrdes Sinnaẜchanas / und no nhewilltighas Titʒibas . Vnd no ẜcheems Baußleems ẜacka Deews patʒ tha : Eß taß Kungs taws Deews / aͤßmu weens dußmiegs Deews / katters par teems / kattri mann eenied / tohß Taͤhwa Ghraͤhkus majahß peemeckleju py teems Baͤhrneems lieds treſſchu und ʒaͤtturtu Aughumu . Bett teems / kattri man mieļo / und mannus Baußlus turr / teems darru eß labb / lieds tuhxtotu Aughumu . Taß gir tick dauds ẜatʒietʒ : Deews beedina ẜohdiet wiſẜus kattri ẜchohß Baußlus pahrkahp . Tapehtʒ buhß mums bieteeß par winja Dußmibu / unnd prett tadeems Baußleems nhe ghraͤkoht . Bett Wings ẜohla Schaͤlaſtibu unnd wiſẜenadu Labbumu wiſẜeems kattri ẜchohß Baußlus turr . Tapehtʒ buhß mums winju arridſan mieļoht / und winjam ustitʒeht / und labpraht darriet pehtʒ winja Baußleems . Ohtran kahrtan peedaͤrr arridſan ẜchiß ẜwehtʒ Ewangeliums eekſchan to ohtru Lohʒekli muhſẜas ẜwaͤhtas{ẜwehtas} Titʒibas / kurr mehß ẜackam : Eß titʒu eekſchan JEſum Chriſtum / Deewa weenighu Daͤhlu / muhſẜu Kunghu / katters eejemmtʒ gir no to Ꞩwaͤhtu Gharru / peedſimbtʒ no tahß Jumprawas Maria . Aiſto ar teems Wahrdeems mehß muhſẜu Titʒibu no to Kunghu JEſu Chriſto us⸗ẜackam / ka Wings gir patteeß Deews no to Taͤhwu eekſchan Muſchibas pedſimbtʒ / und arridſan patteeß Ʒillwaͤhx no tahß Jumprawas Maria peedſim̃is / taß gir ; JEſus Chriſtus gir patteeß Deews uñ patteeß Ʒillwaͤhx . Vnd to mums arridſan ẜcheitan mahʒa ẜchiß Ewangeliums / kad tee Wariſeeŗi ẜacka / Chriſtus aͤſẜohtʒ Dawida Daͤhls / und kad [S. 2.321{301}] Chriſtus patʒ klaht ẜacka / ka Chriſtus aͤſẜohtʒ irr Dawida Kungs . Aiſto Dawida Daͤhls gir Wings pehtʒ ẜawas Ʒillwaͤʒibas / und ka wings no Dawida Ʒilltu und raddu ka Ʒillwaͤhx gir peedſimmis ; bett Dawida Kungs gir Wings / ka weens Deews / Kungs par wiſẜeems Kungheems / und taß Konings par wiſẜeems Koninjeems . Ꞩchimm brieſcham ghribbam mehß klauſẜiteeß / ka weens Raxtamaʒetais tam Kungham Chriſto waiʒa / kurrſch taß auxtakais Baußliß aͤſẜohtʒ / und ka tam JEſus Chriſtus adbild : Pehtʒ ka Chriſtus tam Raxtamaʒetajam und teems Wariſeeŗeems attkal waiʒa / par ko tee Chriſtum turr . O Kunngs JEſu Chriſte / ẜaẜilldi muhſẜas ẜaẜalluſchas Ꞩirrdes arr tawu ẜwaͤhtu{ſwaͤhtu} Gharru / ka mehß toͤw und muhſẜu Tuwaku mieļojam / unnd toͤw ihſtaͤne adſieſtam / Amen . 

MJeļi Draughi / taß ẜwehtʒ Ewangeliſts Mattheus ẜacka tha : Kad tee Wariſeeŗi dſirrdeja / ka JEſus teems Saduceeŗeems to Mutt aisbahſis by / ẜapullʒejahß tee . Ꞩcheitan buhß jums ſinnaht / ka tee Saduceeŗi nhe titʒeja / ka teems Ʒillwaͤkeems buhß Paſtarà Deenà attkall aukſcham ʒellteeß no teem Mirroņeems , tee nhe titʒeja / ka Enghels / Debbeß / Waͤllß und Elle aͤſẜoti / tee nahʒe py to Kunghu JEſum / unnd ẜatʒija : Meiſteri / tu dauds mahʒi no tahß Aukſchamʒellſchanas tahß Meeſẜas ; Py mums by weena Ꞩeewa / tai gir ẜeptinji Wieri / wiß weenas Mahtes Baͤhrni und Brahļi bijuſchi / und weens Bralis pehtʒ ohtru to Ꞩeewu laulaja / bett nu gir wiſẜi tee ẜeptinji Brahļi nomirruſchi / und ta Ꞩeewa arridſan nomirra . Ja tad nu te Ʒillwaͤka⸗Baͤhrni{Ʒillwaͤka⸗Behrni} attkal aukſcham ʒellẜeeß no teems Mirroņeems / ka tu mahʒi / tad ẜacki mums / kaß no teems ẜeptinjeems Wiereems to par Ꞩeewu paturrehß ? [S. 2.322{302}] Tha jautadami ghribbeja tee Saduceeŗi tam Kunngham JEſu Chriſto Kaunu darriet / iht kaut buhtu Wings nhe pareiſe mahʒijiß / und nhe aͤſẜoti weena Aukſchamʒellſchana tahß Meeſẜas ghaiditina . Bett JEſus adbilldeja / unnd ẜatʒija us teems : Juhß allojeeta / und nhe ſinnaht to Raxtu / neds Deewa Spaͤhku{Spehku} . Eekſchan tahß Aukſcham⸗ʒellſchanas tee nei pretʒehß / ney lixeeß pretʒeteeß / bett tee gir ihten ka tee Deewa Engeļi Debbeſẜieß . Bett nhe eſẜeta juhß laſẜijuſhi no tahß Auxſchãʒellſchanas to Mirroņo / ka jums ẜatʒietʒ gir no Deewu / kad Wings runna : Eß aͤßmu taß Deews Abrahama / und taß Deewa Jſaaca / und taß Deews Jaͤcoba ? Bett Deews nhe gir weens Deews no Nomirruẜcho / bett to Dſiewo . Vnd kad to tee Ļaudis dſirrdeja / brienodam̃eeß ißtruʒenajahß tee par winja Maʒibu / ʒeete kluß / uñ ghaja nohſt . Tahdi Ļaudis wehl dauds / Manni Draughi / attraſti tohp / kattri nhe titʒ weenu Aukſchamʒellſchanu tahß Meeſẜas / und weenu muhſchighu Dſiewoſchanu . Ʒeekahds ſkeet / kad taß Ʒillwehx mirrſt / tad taß ihten tha ißniext unnd bohja eet / ka kahds beßprahtiegs Lohps / taß mirrdams peepohl py Semmes / Semmes kahrtà tohp / unnd muhſcham attkall nhe ʒeļļahß . Buhtu daſſch no Ꞩirrds titʒejiß / ka taß Ʒillwaͤhx Paſtarà Deenà attkal aukſcham ʒellſẜeeß no ẜawas Kappas / und ka pehtʒ ſchahß behdighas{blehdighas} Dſiewoſchanaß mums gir ghattawa darrita weena Dſiewoſchana muhſcham beß Ghallu : patteeß taß nhe buhtu tick droſche ghraͤhkojiß{ghrehkojiß} . Bett dſirrdieg tu Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx} ! nhe wileeß tu us to / tu allo ihten ka tee Saduceeŗi / und nhe ſinni / ka Deewa Raxtʒ unnd Ghramata nhe wiļļ . Negg ghann ſkaidre Deewa Wahrds ẜacka : Kungs / tawi Nomirruſchi attkall dſiewohß / unnd arr to Meeſẜu aukſcham ʒellſeeß . Dauds / kattri appakſchan Semmes ghullaͤdami ghull / attkal usmohdieß / Ʒitti py muhſchighas Dſiewoſchanas / ʒitti py muhſchighu Nhe[S. 2.323{303}] ghodu und Kaunu . Bett Deewa Wahrds muhſcham nhe maͤlo / Debbeß und Semme ſuddieß / bett Deewa Wahrds muhſcham nhe ſuhd / jeb tu / O Ʒillwaͤhx / to nhe titʒi / tad tomaͤhr Deews palleek peetitʒiegs / unnd tawas Nhetitʒibas dehļ Wings nhe taps par Maͤlkuli . Kapehtʒ tad tu nhe ghribbi titʒeht to Aukſchamʒellſchanu tawas Meeſẜas ? Kaß to nhe titʒ / taß nhe ſinna / ka Deews wiß⸗ſpehʒiegs / und warr darriet wiß / ko Wings ghrib Debbeſẜies und wirſẜon Sem̃es . Winja Spaͤhx und Stipprums gir tick leels / ka nhe buhß nheneeka truhkt / kapehtʒ Wings tad nhe warraͤtu weenu Mirroni attkal dſiewu darriet ? Nhe gir Deewam taß ghruht bijiß / no nheneka to raddiet / kaß taggad gir ; kapehtʒ Wings tad nhe ſpaͤhtu{ſpehtu} to attkall preeſcha neſt und weſt / kaß jaw pirmahk gir bijis ? Tu allo / O ghrehʒiegs Ʒillwehx / unnd nhe prohti to leelu Ghodu / ar kattru Deews abdahwenahß eekſchan tahß muhſchighas Dſiewoſchanas tohß / kattri eekſchan to titʒ . Tee Saduceeŗi ſchkitta / ja ʒitta Dſiewoſchana ghaiditiņa gir / tad ihten tha tee laulahti Ļaudis kohpà dſiewohß / ka tee ẜcheitan gir dſiewojuẜchi ẜchinny Paſẜauleh . Nhe / Manni Draughi / tee Deewa⸗ißraͤdſaͤti buhß liedſa teems Deewa Engheļeems / to nhe buhß toͤw ta ẜapraſt / ihten ka buhtu muhſẜa Meeſẜa par Gharru pahrwehrta / bett tha leela Ghoda dehļ / tohp taß tha ẜatʒietʒ / arr kattru Deews ẜawus Deewabijatajus abdahwenahß . Winji ſpiedehß{ſpeidehß} ka ta / Ꞩaule / und tad tee liedſaͤni kļuhß tai apſkaidrotai Meeſẜi JEſu CHRJſti / Tee pillnighe Deewu adſieß / ka Wings gir / und pallix py tahß Engeļo Draudes muhſchighe . Tu allo / O tu ghrehʒiegs Ʒillwehx / und nhe ſinni Deewa Paddomu und Dabbu . Wings nhe gir weens Deews to Nomirroẜcho / bett to Dſiewo . Nu gir Wings irr muhſẜo Deews / tapehtʒ jo irr mums buhß dſiewoht . Attſtahjeeß tu no Ghrehkeems / ja tu to nhe darrieſẜi / tad tu arridſan ghann aukſchamʒellſ[S. 2.324{340}] ẜeeß Paſtarà deenà / bett tu tapẜi ẜohdietʒ / uñ wiſẜeems Waͤlleems par Elles⸗paggal preekſcha meſts / tu dexi / und muſcham nhe ẜadexi . Kad nu JEſus tha by teems Saduceeŗeems to Mutt aißbahſis und tohß kluſẜenahjiß / ẜapullʒejahß tee Wariſeeŗi / ſchkißdami / Chriſto leelu kaunu darriet . Vnnd weens ſtarrpan teems / weens Raxtamahʒetaiß kahrdenaja to / ghribbaͤdams to ißklauſẜiet / arrieg taß tick dauds ſinnatu adbilldeht / unnd ẜacka : Meiſteri / kurrſch gir taß auxtakaiß Baußliß eekſchan to Baußlu ? Taß Blehdis dohd labbu Wahrdu / winjam miexta Mehle / ẜautʒ to Kunghu JEſum par Meiſteri / par Mahʒetaju / ka wings arridſan gir / bett tomehr ẜawà Prahtà taß dohmaja / Winjam Kaunu darriet . Kad taß Prettibeneex ẜawu Ballxny mielighu darra / tad nhe titʒi winjam / aiſto ẜeptinjas nhe ghantas Leetas gir winjà Ꞩirrdy . Taß Kungs JEſus / katters wiſẜus paſinna / unnd nhe by winjam waijagha / ka kaßlabba Leeʒibu dohtu no kadu Ʒillwaͤku / aiſto Wings ghann ſinnaja kaß Ʒillwaͤkà by / adbilldeja und ẜatʒija : Toͤw buhß Deewu tawu Kunghu mieļoht no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / no wiſẜas Dwehſẜeles / no wiſẜu Prahtu ; Taß gir taß auxtakaiß Baußliß . Bett taß ohtris gir tam liedſaͤns : Toͤw buhß tawu Tuwaku mieļoht ka toͤw paſſchu . Ꞩchinnieß diwejohß Baußließ karrajahß wiß Baußliß / und tee Proweeteß . Wiß ko Deews mums pawehlejis darriet / taß ſtahw ẜchinnieß diwejahß Leetahß . Toͤw buhß Deewu und tawu Tuwaku Ʒillwaͤku mieļoht . Deewu / no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / Dwehſẜeleß und Prahtu / ja tu ʒittu kahdu Leetu auxtake mieļo ka Deewu tad tu jaw eſẜi noſeedſis / unnd ja tu arridſan ʒittu kahdu Leetu jo tick ļohte mieļo / ka Deewu / tad eſẜi tu arridſan jaw ghraͤkojiß . Deews nhe ghribbahß ẜoͤw kallpojams ar puß Ꞩirrdi / bett no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds . Tapehtʒ irr JEſus Chriſtus ẜacka : Kaß Taͤhwu und Maht wairahk mie[S. 2.325{305}] ļo nhe ka mann / taß nhe gir mannas wehrtes . Vnd tadehļ arridſan taß Kungs Chriſtus ſcho Baußli to auxtaku ẜautʒ / ka ʒittʒ auxtahx unnd leelahx Debbeſẜieß unnd wirß Semmes nhe gir ka Deews / Wings gir leels / unnd darra Brienumus / unnd Wings ween gir Deews / ẜacka taß ẜwehtʒ Konings Dawids . Vnd tawu Tuwaku buhß toͤw mieļoht / ka ẜoͤw paſẜchu . Ꞩchiß Baußliß gir tam pirmajam liedſaͤns / Aiſto weens Kungs und Deews gir abbejus Baußluß dewiß / und taß Kungs katters pawehļ ẜoͤw mieļoht / taß patʒ pawehļ arridſan to Tuwaku Ʒillwaͤku mieloht . Vnnd ka Deews ẜoͤw ghribbahß mielojohts no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / no wiſẜas Dwehſẜeleß / no wiſẜu Prahtu / tha ghribb und pawehl Wings arridſan to Tuwaku mieļoht / Ja / ka ickkattriß ẜoͤw labbe wehļ / tha buhß tam arridſan ẜawam Tuwakam wiß labb wehleht . Vnnd ka Deews teems ẜohla labbe darriet / ẜcheit laiʒighe / und turr muhſchighe / kattri Winju mielo ; attkal / kattri no Ꞩirrds tam nhe kallpo / tohß draude Wings ſcheit laiʒighe / bett wiß wairahk turr muhſchighe ẜohdiet : ihten tha taß patʒ Deews ẜohla teems labbe attkall darriet / kattri tam Tuwakam labbe darra / unnd kattri ẜawu Tuwaku eenied / tohß ghribb Wings attkal eniedeht ; aiſto ar to paſſchu Maͤhru / ar kattru juhs ißmerjohſẜeeta{ißmaͤrohſẜeeta} / taps jums attkall eemaͤhŗohtʒ . Mahʒais nu ẜcheitan / Manns Draugs / unnd paturri / Mieļo Deewu / nhe ween arr Mutt / unnd arr Mehl / bett no Ꞩirrds dibben . Ko pallieds taß / ka tu leelijeeß arr Mutt / tu mielojohtʒ Deewu / und tawa Ꞩirrds nhe ſinna nhe neeka no tahdeems Wahrdeems . Daſſch arridſan ẜacka / Eß mieļo Deewu / eet arridſan Baſniʒà / mahk krahßnus Pahtarus / ja / wings eet irr py Dewu Ghalldu ; Bett wings gir tomehr Burrwiß / Ꞩahls⸗Puhſchlaͤtaiß / jeb Wings tahdus Waͤlla Peſtelus meckle / Wings gir Maͤllkuliß / nhe klauſẜa Kunghu / nei Taͤhwu / nei Maht / nei Raddu / kaß winjam labbe mahʒa / wings rei[S. 2.326{306}] jahß ka Ꞩunß und barrahß / unnd kaujahß ar ẜawu Kaimiņu / gir Beßkauniß / Mauko⸗jaͤhgheris / Laulibas Pahrlauſetais / Saggliß / Willteneex / abmaͤlo ẜawu Tuwaku / ſchkenne und lamma to / unnd ka Wings tickai dabbuit warraͤtu / labpraht Wings jaͤmbtu ẜawa Tuwaka Aehkaß / Lohpus / Manntu und attwilltu tam wiſẜu Ꞩaim . Vnnd tomaͤhr{tomehr} leelijahß Wings / ka Wings Deewu mielojohtʒ . Ghribbi tu / Manns Draugs / teeſcham ẜatʒiet / Es mielo Deewu / tad buhß toͤw arridſan to darriet / ko Deews no toͤw ghribb / und ka tu nhe warri taggad no Ghrehkeems pahrjaͤmbtʒ unnd ẜamaitahtʒ to darriet / tad buhß toͤw tomehr tawà Ꞩirrdy Deewu tawu Kunnghu und winja Wahrdu turreht und mieloht / ghribbaͤdams und ʒeek ſpaͤhdams{ſpeedams} pehtʒ to dſiewoht / ka tu warri arr to ẜwehtu Koninju Dawid ẜatʒiet : No wiſẜas Ꞩirrds mielo eß toͤw / Kunngs / unnd arr to ẜwehtu Apuſtuli Pehteri : Kunngs / tu ſinni wiſẜas Leetas / tu ſinni / ka eß toͤw mielo . Ja tu Deewu mielohſẜi no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / tad tu arridſan winja Wahrdu turrehſẜi / ka Chriſtus JEſus ẜacka : Kaß mann mielo / taß mannu Wahrdu turrehß . Mielohſẜi tu Deewu no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / tad tu tieſche nhe ghrehkohſẜi / unnd ar taweems Ghrehkeems winju nhe apkaitenahſẜi . Labbs Baͤhrns ẜawu Taͤhwu mielodams / darra ʒeek ſpehdams / ko Taͤhws / Mahte ghribb : Ey tu / Manns Draugs / unnd darri tu arridſan tha . Mielo tawu Tuwaku / ka ẜoͤw paſſchu . Jckkattris Ʒillwehx gir taws Tuwakaiß / kaß tawu Pallighu ghribb . Wings ihten tha no Deewu gir raddietʒ / ka irr tu / JEſus Chriſtus gir winju ihten tick ghrute unnd ẜuhre no tahß Elles und tha Waͤlla Wallſtibas atpeſtijiß / ka irr toͤw . Kapehtʒ tad tu winjam ghribbi attrauteeß ? Bett mielo to / nhe Ļaudeems raͤdſoht / bett ka toͤw paſſchu . Tu ghribbi / ka ʒitteem Ļaudeems toͤw buhß mieloht ; ko tu nu ghribbi / ko ʒitteem Ļaudeems toͤw buhß darriet / to buhß toͤw arridſan winjeems darriet . Tu ẜoͤw paſ[S. 2.327{307}] ſchu mielojeeß nhe arr willtighu Ꞩirrdi / nhe ween arr Mehl / ar Wahrdeems / bett itt teeſcham / und no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds : ihten tha mieļo tu arridſan tawu Tuwaku / nhe ween ar Wahrdeems / unnd ar Mehl / bett ar Darrbu unnd itt patteeß . Tu mielojeeß ẜoͤw paſſchu nhe raͤmdaͤne / bett itt karſte / und tahda Mielaͤſtiba nhe ghroſahß / ta palleek ; ihten tha mieļo tu arridſan tawu Tuwaku / ka taß ẜwehtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils mahʒa : Tai Mielibai nhe buhß willtighai buht . Tu / O Ʒillwehx / ẜoͤw paſſchu tha mielojeeß / ka tu to / kaß toͤw Ļaun gir unnd Nhelaim darriet warraͤtu / ʒeek ſpehdams / no toͤw nowehrß / und us to Labbumu dſenneeß : ihten tha darri tu arridſan tawam Tuwakam / und turri tahdu Ꞩirrdi prett winju : Toͤw buhß tam wehlet wiſẜu Labb / Ka toͤw tawa Ꞩirrds paſcham darra . Vnd to gir toͤw pawehlejis Deews taws Kungs / ar ſcheems Wahrdeems : Toͤw buhß to darriet : Toͤw buhß tawu Tuwaku mieloht / ka ẜoͤw paſſchu / aiſto eß aͤßmu taß Kungs . Chriſtus JEſus ẜacka : Taß gir manns Baußliß / ka juhß weens ohtru mielojeteeß / ka eß jumms mielojiß aͤßmu . Vnd attkal : Weenu jaunu Baußlu dohmu eß jumms / ka jums weens ohtru mieloht buhß / ka eß jums mielojiß aͤßmu / py to ickkattriß paſieß / ka juhß manni Mahʒekli eſẜeeta / ja juhß Mielaͤſtibu ẜawà ſtarrpà turreeta . Vnd taß ẜwehtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils mahʒa : Juhß mieli Brahļi / kallpojeteeß weens ohtram ʒaur tahß Mielaͤſtibas . Aiſto wiß Baußliß tohp weenà Wahrdà peepilldiets arr to : Mieļo tawu Tuwaku / ka ẜoͤw paſſchu . Bett ja juhß ẜawà ſtarrpà krimtiſẜeeteeß und reeſẜeeteeß / tad peeluhkojeeta / ka juhß ẜawà ſtarrpà nhe tohpeeta ap⸗ahſti . Vnd kaß nu Deewu unnd ẜawu Tuwaku Ʒillwaͤku nhe mieļo / bett to eenied / wiſẜenadohß Ghraͤkohß dſiewo / und eekſchan teems ẜoͤw [S. 2.328{308}] wahļajahß{ļajahß} und wahrtahß / ka Weppris Pallty / Deewu apkaitina / und ẜawam Tuwakam Ʒillwaͤkam Baͤhdas darra ; patteeß tam nhe buhß Daļļas eekſchan Debbeſẜo wallſtibas . Tadehļ / M.D. laid allaſch tawahß Auſẜieß attſkanneht to Maʒibu : Toͤw buhß Deewu tawu Kunnghu mieloht no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / no wiſẜas Dwehſẜeles / no wiſẜu Prahtu / und tawu Tuwaku ka ẜoͤw paſſchu . Ohtran kahrtan laideeta mums nu arridſan klauſẜiteeß / ka JEſus Chriſtus tohß Wariſeeŗus waiʒa / no ẜoͤw paſẜchu / unnd ẜacka / kad tee wiſẜi kohpà by : Ko ſchkeetaht juhß no Chriſto / ka Daͤhls gir taß ? Taß Raxtamaʒetaiß by pirrmiet Chriſtum ween waiʒajiß / bett nu waiʒa Chriſtus JEſus wiſẜus Wariſeeŗus . Vnd ghribb Wings ẜatʒiet : Juhß Ʒeenighi Kunghi eſẜeeta mann pahrklauſẜijuẜchi no to Baußlu / nhe jemmeta par Ļaun / ka eß jums arridſan ko waiʒahſchu / juhß leelijeteeß dauds no juhſẜu / Meſẜia / ẜackaita mann / kam peedaͤrr Wings / ka Daͤhls gir taß ? Tee Wariſeeŗi ẜatʒija : Dawida . Taß by ghann labbe adbilldehtʒ / bett nhe pillnighe : No tha Kunngha Chriſti Ʒilwehʒibas ſinna tee Wariſeeŗi runnaht / bett no Winja Deewibas nhe ſinna tee nheneeka . Taß gir teeß / ka Chriſtus Dawida Daͤhls gir / aiſto no Dawida tha Koninja Ʒilltas gir Wings ka Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx} ʒehleeß / ka irr taß Apuſtuls Pahwils ẜacka : Wings gir peedſimmis no to Ꞩaͤhklu ( Aſẜini ) Dawida / tahs Meeſẜas dehl . Bett ka CHriſtus JEſus arridſan Deewa Daͤhls / unnd patteeß Deews gir / to tee Ļautiņi nhe ſinna . Tapehtʒ Chriſtus ẜcheitan wehl ẜacka : Ka tad taß nahkahß / ka Dawids to Gharrà par Kunnghu ẜautʒ / ẜatʒidams . Taß Kunngs ( Deews taß Taͤhws ) ẜatʒija us mannu Kunghu / ( to Meſẜiam / to Kunghu Chriſtum JEſum ) ẜehdeeß pa mannu labbu Rohku / teekams eß tawus Eenaidneekus leeku par Pamaͤßlu tawahms Kahjahms . Ja to nu Dawids [S. 2.329{309}] par Kunghu ẜautʒ / ka gir taß tad winja Daͤhls . JESVS Chriſtus ghribb tick dauds ẜatʒiet : Eß dſirrſchu / ka juhß Wariſeeŗi ſchkeetaht / taß Meſẜias / Chriſtus aͤſẜohtʒ Dawida Daͤhls / und patteeß Ʒillwaͤhx / unnd taß gir teeß ; bett winjam buhß arridſan patteeſẜe Deewam buht ʒittade taß Konings Dawids nhe buhtu to ẜawu Kunnghu ẜautʒiß . Aiſto muhſcham taß nhe gir dſirrdaͤhtʒ / ka Taͤhws ẜawu Daͤhlu / par Kunghu / und par ẜawu Kunnghu buhtu ẜautʒis . Aran to by jums paſſcheems praẜt / ka Chriſtus nhe ween tiers Ʒillwaͤhx / bett arridſan ihſtaͤns Deews aͤſẜohtʒ . Vñ nhe weens nhe ſinnaja tam kahdu Wahrdu adbilldeht / und nhe drieſteja arridſan no tahß Deenas tam wairs jautaht . Tee Wariſeeŗi ſchkittahß Chriſto JEſu Kaunu darriet / bett Wings darra ẜcheems leelu Kaunu . Mahʒais tu / M.D. tawu Kunghu JEſu Chriſtum pareiſe adſiet / aiſto eekſchan to tu Ꞩirrds⸗Preeku / Schaͤlaſtibu und to muhſchighu Dſiewoſchanu attrohdi . Wings gir Deews unnd Ʒillwaͤhx / ka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliſts Jahnis ẜacka : Taß Wahrds ( taß gir / Deewa Daͤhls ) tappa Meeſẜa / unnd dſiewoja muhſẜu ſtarrpà / und mehß redſejam winja Ghodu / weenu Ghodu / ka tha weenigha⸗peedſimbta Daͤhla no Taͤhwu / pillu ſchaͤlaſtibas und Taißnibas . Ja / M.D. kad toͤw by pallidſaͤtam und peſtitam tapt / no to Ghraͤku Naſtu / und tahß Elles Mohkahms / tad by tawam Peſtitajam buht Dawida Daͤhlam / taß gir / winjam by patteeſẜe Ʒillwaͤkam buht . Aiſto taß taißnis Deews by ẜatʒijis us to Ʒillwaͤku : Kuŗŗu deenu tu no to aisleektu Kohku ehd / buhß toͤw itt teeſcham mirrt . Bett nu bya taß Ʒillwaͤhx ſcho Deewa / Wahrdu pahrkahpis / und tadehļ buhtu arridſan wiſẜa Paſẜaule / taß gir / wiſẜi Ļaudis Paſẜauleh dſiewodami muhſchighe tam Waͤllam nodohtini bijuſchi tam by tohß ſpiedſinaht unnd wahrdſinaht Elles Vgguny / kad JEſus CHriſtus nhe buhtu muhſẜu [S. 2.330{310}] Meeſẜu unnd Aſẜini usjehmis / unnd Ʒillwaͤhx tappis . Bett ka Wings nu to gir darrijis / unnd muhſẜo dehļ eekſcham ẜchahß Paſẜaules nahʒis / und weens Ʒillwaͤka Baͤhrns tappis / tad ſchaͤhlo Deews mums ẜawa Daͤhla dehļ . No tahdu leetu runna taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pawils ẜatʒidams : Ka ʒaur weena ( Ʒillwaͤka ) Ghraͤku ta Paſudenaſchana par wiſẜeems Ʒillwaͤkeems gir nahkuſẜi ; tha gir arridſan ʒaur weena ( Ʒillwaͤka ) Taißnibu ta Noteeẜaſchana tahß dſiewibas par wiſẜeems Ʒillwaͤkeems nahkuſẜi . Vnd ka ʒaur weena Ʒillwaͤka Nheklauẜiſchanu dauds Ghreʒeneeki tappuſchi gir ; tha arridſan ʒaur weena ( Ʒillwaͤka ) Paklauſẜiſchanu tohp dauds Taißni . Nhe buhtu / JEſus Chriſtus / taws Peſtitais / Ʒillwaͤhx tappis / tad nhe buhtu wings warrejis tahß ruhktas Mohkas ʒeeſt / unnd mirrt / und ʒaur ẜawu Nahwu mums no tahß muhſchighas Nahwes attpeſtiet . Aiſto Chriſtus gir nokautʒ pehtʒ to Meeſẜu . Nu warri tu / O Ʒillwaͤhx / ar preeʒighu Ꞩirrdi ẜatʒiet : Chriſtus JEſus gir nomirris muhſẜo ghraͤko dahļ / unnd ta Nahwe gir aprieta eekſchan tahß Vswarreſchanas . Tha lieds arridſan / ja toͤw by peſtitam tapt no tahms muhſchighams Mohkahms / tad by tawam Peſtitajam buht Dawida Kunngham / taß gir / ihſtaͤnam / muhſchigham / wiß⸗ſpehʒigham Deewam / ʒittade nhe buhtu Wings to leelu Nhelaim no toͤw warrejis nowehrſt / und tahß{tohß} Dahwanus / kattras{kattrus} tu biji pamettiß / nhe buhtu Wings toͤw attkal warrejis att⸗dabbuit . Abdohma patʒ / M.D. ka ghruhti und leeli ghruhti by tawi Ghraͤki ? kahda by ta Lahſta / kattru Deews by us teems Ghreʒeneekeems litʒis / kad wings ẜacka : Noladaͤhtam buhß buht ick⸗kattram / kaß Deewa Wahrdu pahrkahp ? Kaß warreja Deewa Dußmibu pa⸗neẜt ? Ka ghaidija taß Waͤlls us muhſẜu Dwehſẜel und Meeſẜu / ka wings mums warraͤtu ẜawohß Naggohß dabbuit ? Kaß warraͤtu toͤw / O tu nabbahgs Ʒillwaͤhx / no tahdas leelas [S. 2.331{311}] Nhelaimes und baͤhdeems peſtiet und pallidſeht ? Nhe kahda raddita leeta / ney Debbeſẜies ney wirß Semmes ſpehja tohß ghraͤkus delldeht / Deewa dußmibu remmdeht / unnd tha Waͤlla Wallſtibu unnd Spaͤhku ẜmilldſinaht . Tapehtʒ by tawam Peſtitajam buht patteeß⸗Deewam / ka Wings toͤw pillnighe attpeſtiet / unnd no tha ſtippra bruņņota Waͤlla Warru ißraut / und eekſchan Debbeſẜa⸗Wallſtibas ee⸗waͤſt warraͤtu . Juhß ſinnaht paſẜchi / M.D. kad kaßlabban tahdus Ļaudis ghribb ẜaliedſenaht / kattri Eenaidà dſiewo / tad buhß tam weenam tick labb ka ohtram Labbs Draugs buht . Nu by ſtarp Deewu und Ʒillwaͤku ta wiß⸗leelaka Eenaidiba laͤhkuſẜeeß . Ja tad nu tam apkaitenahtam Deewam attkal by ẜaliedſenatam unnd ẜadarraͤtam tapt / ar to Ʒillwaͤku / kaß Deewu by apkaitenajis / tad by Jeſus Chriſtus buht Draugs irr Deewa irr Ʒillwaͤka . Nu warri / tu Ʒillwaͤhx / ar preeʒighu Mutt ẜatʒiet unnd dſeedaht : Redſi / Deews gir mans Peſtitais . Deews gir ẜawu Drauds attpirʒeeß ʒaur ẜawu paſſchu Aſẜini . Tawa Ꞩirrds ſinna nu itt teeſcham / ka tu pillnighe attpeſtietʒ eſẜi . Aiſto mehß aͤſẜam ẜaliedſenati ar Deewu ʒaur to Nahwu ẜawa Daͤhla . Tu / O Ʒillwaͤhx / warri ẜatʒiet ar to ſwahtu Apuſtulu{Aupuſtulu} Pawilu : Deewa Daͤhls gir mann mieļojis / unnd gir ẜoͤw paſſchu mannis dehļ nodehweeß . Vnnd taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Jahnis ẜacka : Eekſchan to gir attradijuſẜeeß Deewa Mielaͤſtiba prett mums / ka Deews ẜawu weenu⸗peedſimbtu Daͤhlu ẜuhtijis gir / ka mums ʒaur to dſiewoht buhß . Taß Kunngs JEſus gir arridſan Chriſtus / taß gir / taws Mahʒetais unnd Konings unnd Wirſẜeneeex . Wings mahʒa toͤw / ka Deews taß debbeſẜo Taͤhws no ẜirrds dibben toͤw mieļo / unnd to paſſchu Mahʒibu gir wings pawehlejis ẜaweems Mahʒekļeems pehtʒ ẜawas Aukſcham⸗ʒellſchanas wiſẜai Paſẜaulei paẜluddenaht / ẜatʒidams : Eita projam wiſẜà [S. 2.332{312}] Paſẜauleh / unnd mahʒeeta wiſẜus Ļaudis / und Chriſtijeeta tohß eekſchan to Wahrdu tha Taͤhwa / unnd tha Daͤhla / unnd tha ẜwaͤhta Gharra / unnd mahʒeeta toͤß turreht wiß / ko Eß jums pa⸗wehlejis aͤßmu . Ko tu M.D. nu no Deewu und winja Wahrdu ſinni / to patteitʒ tawam Peſtitajam und Mahʒetajam Chriſto . CHriſtus / ẜacku eß / gir Wings / aiſto Wings luhds preekſch toͤw . Aiſto tha wings luhgdams ẜacka : O Taͤhws / eß luhdſu preekſch teems / kattrus tu mann dehwis eſẜi / unnd nhe⸗ween preekſch teems / bett arridſan preekſchan teems / kattri ʒaur winjo ( to Mahʒetajo ) Wahrdu eekſchan man titʒehß . Vnd py ta Kruſta Kohku ẜatʒija Wings : Taͤhws / peedohd teems / aiſto tee nhe ſinna / ko tee darra . Kaß gir tee / preekſch kattreems Chriſtus luhds ? Negg gir tee winja Waideneeki ? unnd kattri to py to Kruſtu pee⸗nagglojuẜchi by ? Aiſto tee Kaŗŗa⸗wieri muhſcham nhe buhtu CHriſtum py Kruſtu pee⸗ẜittuſchi / kad tas Semmes⸗Ꞩohghis Pontius Pilatus nhe buhtu to pa⸗wehlejis . Pilatus nhe buhtu to pawehlejis / kad tee Juddi nhe buhtu braͤhkuſchi : Ꞩitt to kruſtà / Ꞩitt to kruſtà . Vnnd ko buhß dauds ẜatʒiet / nei tee Juddi / nei Pilatus buhtu ko warrejis baudiet{baudeht} / kad muhſẜo Ghraͤhki nhe buhtu us Jeſu Chriſti Mugguru ghullejuẜchi : Tapehtʒ luhds wings arridſan preekſch mums / und warram mehs ẜatʒiet : Nu mehß aͤſẜam taißnoti ʒaur to Titʒibu / tad gir mums Meers ar Deewu ʒaur muhſẜu Kunnghu JEſum Chriſt . Taws Wirẜeneex gir JESVS CHriſtus arridſan / aiſto / ka wings tam Waͤllam to ſpaͤhku pa⸗jehmis gir / und toͤw no Waͤlla Wallſtibas atpeſtijis ; tha ghribb Wings nu no toͤw ka toͤw winjam buhß kallpoht eekſchan Ꞩwehtibas unnd Taißnibas / kattra winjam pattick / Tam paſſcham muhſẜam Kunngham JEſu Chriſto gir Ghods und Ꞩlawa muhſchighe muhſcham / Amen . [S. 2.333{313}] Teil 2.24

Evangelium am neunʒehenden Sontag nach Trinitatis / Matth. 9. 

To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / ka taß ſchehliegs Kunngs JEſus Chriſtus weenam Maͤllmaͤna⸗ẜehrdſigham Ʒillwaͤkam tohß Ghraͤkus peedohd / und pehtʒ arridſan py Meeſẜas pallieds / unnd to waͤſẜalu darra / apraxta taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliſts Mattheus / ẜawà Ghramatà Dewità Weetà / unnd ſkann tee Wahrdi juhſẜà Wallodà tha : [S. 2.334{314}] 

JEſus kahpe Laiwà / unnd ʒehlehß attkal pahre / unnd nahʒe ẜawà Pili . Vnnd raughi / tad neſẜe tee weenu Maͤllmaͤna⸗ẜehrdſighu / taß ghulleja Ghulltà . Kad nu Jeſus winjo Titʒibu redſeja / ẜatʒija taß us to Maͤllmaͤna⸗ẜehrdſighu / turrais labbu Prahtu / manns Daͤhls / tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti . Vnd raugi / ʒitti ſtarrpan teems Raxtamaʒetajeems runnaja ẜawà ſtarrpà : Ꞩchiß ẜaimo Deewu . Bett kad JEſus winjo Dohmas redſeja / ẜatʒija taß : Kapehtʒ domajeeta juhß tick ļaun juhſẜahß Ꞩirrdihs ? Kaß gir laͤhtake ẜatʒiet : Toͤw gir tawi Ghraͤki peedohti / jeb ẜatʒiet : Ʒellees / unnd ſtaigha ? Bett ka juhß ſinnaht / ka ta Ʒillwaͤka Daͤhlam Warra gir wirs Semmes tohß Ghraͤkus peedoht / ẜatʒija taß us to Maͤllmaͤna⸗ẜehrdſighu : Ʒellees aukſcham / jemm tawu Ghulltu / und ey Mahjahß . Vnnd taß ʒehlehß aukſcham unnd ghaja Mahjahß . Kad tee Ļaudis to redſeja / brinojahß tee / unnd teitʒe Deewu / katters tahdu Spaͤhku tem Ʒillwaͤkeem dewis gir . 

MJeļi Draughi / Ꞩchiß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliums peedaͤrr eekſchan to treſſchu Lohʒekli muhſẜas ẜwaͤhtas Titʒibas / kur mehß ẜackam : Eß titʒu Peedoẜchanu to Ghraͤko . Taß ſchehliegs Deews ickdeenas eekſchan tahs Chriſtitas Draudſibas wiſẜeems [S. 2.335{315}] Titʒigheems wiſẜus Ghraͤkus baggatighe peedohd . Aiſto ihten ka taß Kungs Chriſtus ẜchim Nheweſẜeļam tohß Ghraͤkus pee⸗dohd / ẜatʒidams : Turrais labbu Prahtu / manns Daͤhls / tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw pee⸗dohti / unnd tha pirrmahk to Ꞩackni wiſẜenadas Nhelaimes und Nheweſẜelibas ißrau / aiſto to Ghraͤko / to Ghraͤko dehļ Deews to Ʒillwaͤhku pahrmahʒa und ẜohda / ka winja Skaiſtums iß⸗taͤhraͤhtʒ tohp / ka no Kuẜtoņeems / ẜacka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Konings Dawids : ihten tha taß patʒ Kungs JEſus CHriſtus teems Baßniʒas Taͤhweems tahdu Spaͤhku unnd Warru dehwis / teems nabbagheems Ghrehʒeneekeems tohß Ghraͤkus peedoht / und teems nhetitʒigheems nhe peedoht . Vnnd ko tee peedohd eekſchan to Wahrdu JEſu / to peedohd arridſan Deews Debbeſẜies . Mehß ghribbam ẜchim brieſcham mahʒiteeß / ko ick⸗kattram Chriſtitam Ʒillwaͤkam no to Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu ſinnaht unnd titʒeht buhß / ka taß arridſan warraͤtu ẜawu Ꞩirrdi usrunnaht und ẜatʒiet / Turrais labbu Prahtu / Manna Ꞩirrds / tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti . Taß Kunngs JESVS Chriſtus / kattram Spaͤhx unnd Waļļa gir / tohß Ghraͤkus peedoht / taß ghribbaͤtu mums wiſẜeems arridſan muhſẜus Ghraͤkus peedoht / und ar ẜawu Ꞩwaͤhtu Gharru mums klaht ſtahweht / Amen . 

MJeļi Draughi / to Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu ẜacka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pawils aͤſẜam weenu dahrghu ʒeenighu Wahrdu / mums buhß to Mahʒibu auxte turreht unnd ʒeeniet / tapehtʒ arridſan ick⸗kattram Chriſtitam Ʒillwaͤkam no Ꞩirrds ẜcho Mahʒibu waͤhrà jembt buhß . Pirrmahk maiʒais / Manns Draugs / Kaß taß gir / kam taß Spaͤhx gir Ghraͤkus peedoht unnd attlaiſt ? Taß gir [S. 2.336{316}] taws und manns Kungs und Peſtitais JEſus Chriſtus . Aiſto taß patʒ ẜacka us to Maͤllmaͤna⸗ẜehrdſighu : Turrais labbu Prahtu / Manns Daͤhls / tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti . Tohß Wahrdus warr wings teeẜcham runnaht / laid tee Wariſeeŗi Mutt ghrohſa / ka ghribbaͤdami / aiſto taß Kungs JEſus nhe gir ween kahds tiers Ʒillwaͤhx / bett arridſan ihſtaͤns Deews / ka Wings to parahda unnd mahʒa ar to Brienumu / ẜcho Nheweſẜeli / kattru tſchettri Wieri neſẜe / waͤſẜaͤlu darridams / ka taß tudeļļ aukſcham ʒehlehß / ẜawu Ghulltu ẜajehme / us ẜawahms Kahjahms ſtahweja und noghaja kur ghribbaͤdams / ihten ka nhe buhtu tam muhſcham nhe kahdas Ꞩahpes bijuẜchi . Tha gir nu taß Kunngs JEſus patteeß Deews unnd Ʒillwaͤhx / und tapehtʒ Wings arridſan tohß Ghraͤkus teems Ghrehʒeneekeems peedoht und attlaiſt warr . Vnnd ka Deewam ween peedaͤrr tohß Ghraͤkus peedoht / to warram mehß aran to ẜapraſt / kad mehß apdomajam / pretti kam mehß ghraͤkojam . Nu pahrkahpjam mehß nhekahda Ʒillwaͤka Baußlu / bett paſſcha Deewa Wahrdu unnd Baußlu / pretti Deewu mehß ghraͤkojam / tadehļ Winjam ween Waļļa gir / muhſẜus Ghraͤkus mums peedoht . To abdohmaja taß Konings Dawids / tapehtʒ Wings ẜacka : Prett toͤw ween ( O Deews ) aͤßmu eß ghraͤkojis / und nhe pareiſe preekſch toͤw darrijis . Redſi / kad kaßlabba toͤw kahdas ẜimbtas Mahrkas buhtu parrada / und ʒitts ghribbaͤtu tam Parradneekam attlaiſt und peedoht to Parradu / tad buhtu tu und taws Parradneex peewilltʒ : tu ẜatʒitu / kaß ẜweſſcham ar mannu Naudu ja⸗darra / ko Wings mañu Naudu ʒittam ſchkingko ? Jhten tha ẜchinny leetà arridſan noteek / kaß dſiŗŗahß beß Deewu ʒittam to Ghraͤko⸗Parradu attlaiſt / taß wiļļ / und kaß us to wiļļahß / taß patteeß peewilltʒ . Taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls unnd Ewangeliſts Jahnis ẜacka : Tee Ghraͤki gir Pahrkahpẜchana to Deewa Baußlo / Wiß kaß prett Deewu [S. 2.337{317}] und winja Wahrdu gir / taß gir Ghraͤhx . Ja tad nu kaßlabba ghribb Ghraͤkus peedoht / tam buhß pa⸗rahdiet / ka Winjam Waļļa gir par Deewa Baußlu / no to ko attlaiſt . Bett to nhe warr nhe weens Ʒillwaͤhx / no Taͤhwu unnd Mahtes Paſẜauleh dſimmis teickteeß . Tapehtʒ attkal Deewam ween taß Ghohds pee⸗daͤrr / Ghraͤkus peedoht . To Ghohdu dehwe Deewam Moſes / ẜatʒidams : Taß Kungs gir paʒeetiegs und no leelas Schaͤlaſtibas / Wings peedohd Noſeedſibu unnd Pahrkahpſchanu : O Kunngs Deews eſẜi ſchehliegs pehtʒ tawas leelas Schaͤlaſtibas . Konings Dawids ẜacka : Py toͤw / Deews gir Peedohẜchana / ka toͤw byteeß buhß . Patʒ Deews ẜacka ʒaur to Proweetu Eſaia : Eß / Eß delldeju tawus Ghraͤkus ka to Migglu / und tawus Noſeghummus ka tahß Padebbeſẜes . Taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils ẜacka : Deews ween gir taißnis / unnd darra taißnu to / kattram ta Titʒiba gir us JEſu . Redſi nu / Manns Draugs / ka ʒittam nhe peedaͤrr / Ghraͤkus peedoht no paſſchu Spaͤhku unnd Waļļas / ka tickai Deewam ween . Tapehtʒ luhds Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu no Deewu / ẜacki no Ꞩirrds : Deews eſẜi mann ſchehliegs pehtʒ tawas Lehnibas / unnd dellde mannus Ghraͤkus pehtʒ tawas leetas Schaͤlaſtibas . Ja tu to darrieſẜi / tad tee Wahrdi irr py toͤw teeſẜi buhß / kattrus taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Jahnis ẜacka : Kad mehß ẜawus Ghraͤkus iß⸗ẜackam / tad gir Deews peetitʒiegs unnd taißnis / ka Wings mums tohß Ghraͤkus peedohd / und ſchkieſti mums no wiſẜu Nhetickumu : mehß arridſan dſirrdehſẜim tohß mielighus Wahrdus : Turreeß labbu Prahtu / manns Daͤhls / manna Meita / tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti . Ohtrà kahrtà mahʒaiteeß / Kapehtʒ Deews mums muhſẜus Ghraͤkus peedoht unnd attlaiſt ghribb ? Kadehļ [S. 2.338{318}] Wings ẜatʒiet ghribb / Turreeß labbu Prahtu / manns Daͤhls ? Diwi letas gir / manni Draughi / kapehtʒ Deews mums muhſẜus Ghraͤkus ghribb peedoht . Weena gir / Deewa leela Schaͤlaſtiba / Lehniba unnd Mielaͤſtiba / eekſchan tahß buhß mums meckleht Ghraͤko peedohſchanu / nhe eekſchan mumms paſſcheems . Mecklehſẜim mehß to eekſchan mums / tad mehß tickai Ghraͤkus ween attraſẜim / aiſto wiſẜa muhſẜa Dohmaẜchana gir nickna no muhſẜas pirrmahß Behrnibas / und Deews irr py ẜaweems Ꞩwaͤhteems Wainu attrohd / ka tad wißwairahk py mums / kattri to Nhetaißnibu ee⸗dſeŗŗam ka Vhdeni . Py mums gir wiſẜas Leetas ẜamaitatas / muhſẜo Prahtʒ gir tumbs / unnd ẜwehſſch no tahß Ghaißmas / Muhſẜo Prahtʒ turraͤhß allaſch prett Deewa Prahtu / unnd nhe ſpeh ẜoͤw paſſcham paliedſeteeß / ka tam tee Ghraͤki peedohti taptu . Chriſtus JEſus ẜacka : Beß mannis nhe warreta juhß nhe neeka darriet . Vnnd tha ẜackoht / jebſche mehs dauds labb darritam : tomaͤhr mehß ar muhſẜeems Darrbeems Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu nhe nopellnitam . Aiſto wiß ko mehß labb darram / taß nhe gir muhſẜo Darrbs / bett tha ʒeenigha Ꞩwaͤhta Gharra Darrbs / taß to Labbumu eekſchan mums / unnd ʒaur mums ſtrahda / taß Ꞩwaͤhtʒ Gharrs darrbojahß / ka mehß ka kahdi Leetas⸗Trauki tahß Ꞩchaͤlaſtibas tohpam . Taß gir wiß Deewa / nhe muhſẜo Darrbs / Deewa Dahwana tha gir ; ka warram tad mehß Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu ar muhſẜeems labbeems Darrbeems nopellniet ? Mums buhß itt ſchkieſte no mums paſſcheems attkahpteeß / kad mehß Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu mecklejam / unnd attſieteeß / ka mehß Ghreʒeneeki aͤſẜam . Bett eekſchan Deewu / py winja Schaͤlaſtibas / kattra beß ghallu gir / buhß mums Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu meckleht . To mahʒa mums Konings Dawids : Schehliegs und lehniegs gir taß Kungs / peeʒeetiegs und no leelas Lehnibas / wings allaſch ar mums nhe bahrſẜeeß / neds muhſcham duß[S. 2.339{319}] mohß / Wings nhe darra{barra} ar mums ka muhſẜo Ghraͤki gir / unnd nhe attmaxa mums / ka mehß ar muhſẜeems Noſeghummeems nopellnijuſchi aͤſẜam . Deewa Schaͤlaſtibai mehß pateitʒam / ka mehß neh{} aͤſẜam ißniekuẜchi / no Winju dabbujam mehß Ghraͤko Peedoẜchanu . Aiſto no Deewa Schaͤlaſtibas eſẜeeta juhß ẜwaͤhti tappujuẜchi / ʒaur to Titʒibu / und taß patʒ nhe gir no jums / Deewa Dahwana gir ta / nhe no Darrbeems / ka nhe weens warr teickteeß jeb leeliteeß . Ta ohtra Leeta / kadehļ Deews mums muhſẜus Ghraͤkus peedohd / gir taß Nopaͤlns muhſẜa Kungha JEſu Chriſti . Daſch warraͤtu dohmaht : Deews gir ſchehliegs / bett Wings gir arridſan barrgs . Nu / Schaͤlaſtibu paradiet / unnd barrgham buht / ka warr taß kohpa ſtahweht ? Klauſẜais manns Draugs Deewa Ghramata / kattra nhe weenu peewiļļ / kaß no to leekahß mahʒiteeß / toͤw rahda / weenu Widdetaju / katters Deewa Taißnibai ghann gir darrijiß / Deewa Baußlu peepilldijiß / unnd Deewam to Ꞩirrdi pahr⸗jehmiß / ka taß nu projam mums ſchehliegs gir . Ꞩchiß Widdetaiß gir taß Kungs JESVS Chriſtus / patteeß Deews und Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx} / taß gir muhſẜo labbahd us ẜchahß Paſẜaules nahʒiß und Ʒillwaͤhx tappiß arridſan ka Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx} ʒeetiß und nomirris / arr to ẜawu ruhktu Nahwu unnd Mohkahms tohß Ghraͤkus ißdelldejiß / tohß deßmittus Deewa Baußlus peepilldijiß / Deewa Dußmibu no mums nowehrẜiß / und to muhſchighu Schaͤlaſtibu und Debbeſẜo⸗Wallſtibu nopellnijiß . Tapehtʒ gir nu Deewa Daͤhls Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx} tappiß / ka Wings warraͤtu ka Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx} ʒeeẜt unnd mirrt . Aiſto Ʒillwaͤhx by ghraͤkojiß / Ʒillwaͤkam by ʒeeſt und{snd} maxaht . Deews by arridſan tam Ʒillwaͤkam to Baußlu dehwiß / Ʒillwaͤkam by arridſan muhſẜà Weetà pehtʒ to Baußlu dſiewoht / Ʒillwaͤkam by to Kunghu Chriſtum buht / ka tam muhſẜo dehļ ſchehligha Ꞩirrds warraͤtu buht . Reddſeta / ẜcha dehļ by to Kunghu JEſum Chriſtum Ʒillwaͤkam buht . [S. 2.340{320}] Ꞩchim muhſẜam Widdetejam by arridſan Deewu buht / ka Wings patʒ warraͤtu Deewam patickt / und ſchkieſts / und taißniß buhtu / aiſto winjam by mums Ghraͤʒeneekus ſchkieſtiet . Winjam by praẜt / ka ghruhti und ẜmaggi to Ghraͤko Naẜta gir / kattru nhe weens tiers Ʒillwaͤhx neẜt warr / Winjam tam Widdetajam by to neẜt ; Winjam by pretti ſtahweht tam Waͤllam / teems Ghraͤkeems / tai Ellei / und tai muhſchighai Nahwei / unnd tohß wiſẜus us⸗wahreht . Nhe weens tiers Ʒillwaͤhx tahdu leelu Darrbu warreja lieds pillam / wiſẜas Paſẜauleß dehļ noſtrahdaht / redſeeta / tapehtʒ by muhſẜam Widdetajam Deewu buht / ka taß Ʒillwehx / jeb ta Ʒillweʒiba eekſchan Chriſto nhe ißniektu . Ꞩchiß Widdetais / taß Kungs JEſus Chriſtus / gir mums attpeſtijis no Deewa Dußmibas / tam warram mehß pateickt / ka mehß to jauku Wahrdu nu dſirrdam : Turreeß labbu Prahtu / manns Daͤhls / manna Meita . To abdohmadam ẜacka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils : Deews gir to / katters no nhekahdeems Ghraͤkeems ſinnaja / muhſẜo dehļ par Ghraͤkeems darrijis / ka mehß eekſchan to ta Taißniba / kattra preekſch Deewu maxa / taptam . Vnnd irr taggad wehl Wings ſtahw Deewa unnd muhſẜo ſtarrpà / unnd iß⸗luhds mums ; ʒitade mehß nhe drieſtaͤtam Deewa preekſchà nahkt . Vs ẜcho Widdetaju paļaujeeß / O Ghrehʒeneex / no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / titʒi us to Kunghu JEſum Chriſtum / tad dabbuiſẜi tu Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu / unnd to Debbeſẜo Wallſtibu . Aiſto weens Widdetais gir ſtarrpa Deewu unnd ſtarrp Ʒillwaͤkeems / taß Ʒillwehx JEſus Chriſtus / ẜacka taß Apuſtuls Pahwils . Bett kaß ghribb ʒittu ʒeļļu Beß ẜcho Widdetaju ſtaighaht / To warr ghann dries [S. 2.341{321}] Tha Waͤlla Spaͤhx Ar ẜawu Willtibu ißbeedenaht . Treſſchà kahrtà maiʒais / Manns Draugs / Kahda ta Peedohẜchana gir ? Daſſch warraͤtu dohmaht / arrieg wiſẜi Ghraͤki tohp peedohti ẜcheitan no Deewu ? jeb buhß mums wehl par ʒitteems ghann darriet ? Manns Draugs / kad Deews toͤw tawus Ghraͤkus peedohd / tad peedohd und attlaiſch Wings wiſẜus / Wiſẜus tawus Ghraͤkus Wings toͤw peedohd . Redſi / ẜchiß Maͤllmaͤna ẜehrdſiegs Ʒillwaͤhx nhe by ween reis ween ghraͤkojis / bett ar dauds unnd daſchadeems Ghraͤkeems ẜawu Ꞩirrdi apghrutenajis / Waͤſẜaͤls buhdams wings nhe by Deewa Wahrdu labpraht dſirrdejis / Deewam tam wiſẜewallditajam Radditajam par Waͤſẜaͤlahms Kahjahms und Rohkahms no Ꞩirrds dibben nhe pateitʒis / ar leelu Ehẜchanu und Dſerrẜchanu / ar leelu Dußmu by Wings ẜcho Nheweſẜelibu und Ꞩaͤrrghu dabbujeeß / unnd ʒittus Ghraͤkus wehl by Wings darrijis / und tomahr taß Kungs JEſus Winjam wiſẜus Ghraͤkus attlaiſch / und ẜacka : Tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti ; buhtu irr wairahk bijuẜchi / wiſẜi wiſẜi tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti . Mehß tohpam beß ( muhſẜu ) Nopaͤllnu taißni / aran ( Deewa ) Schaͤlaſtibas / ʒaur to Attpeſtiẜchanu / kattra ʒaur JEſum Chriſtum notickuſẜi gir / ẜacka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils . Nu warri tu arridſan / Manns Draugs / drohẜchu Ꞩirrdi turrehteeß / ka tu ſinni / gir toͤw Deews tawus Ghrehkus peedehwis / tad gir Wings wiſẜus tawus Ghraͤkus peedehwis / gir Wings toͤw wiſẜus Ghraͤkus peedehwis / tad gir Wings toͤw arridſan wiſẜu to Ꞩohdibu attlaidis / to muhſchighu Nahwu / Elles Mohkas / und to muhſchighu Paſuẜchanu / kattru tu biji ar taweems Ghrehkeems nopellnijis . Aiſto jebſche tawi Ghraͤki gir tick ẜarrkani ka Aſẜins / tad buhß teems tomehr tick ballteem tapt / ka taß balltʒ Ꞩneegs / ẜacka Deews patʒ py to Proweetu Eſaia . [S. 2.342{322}] Nu warraͤtu attkal ẜcheitan kahds no jums dohmaht : Kad Deews mann wiſẜus mannus Ghraͤkus peedohd / unnd attlaiſch mann irr to Ꞩohdibu / kattru eß ar teems nopellnijiß aͤßmu / kapehtʒ Wings tad mann tomehr ẜcheitan wehl daſchadu Nhelaim peeẜuhta ?
